title: 航海霸業
description:
遊戲介紹：

1.	真實而有地域特色的貿易物品：
遊戲中選擇了在大航海時代最有代表性的西歐、北歐各10座著名城市，分佈在地中海、北海、波羅的海沿岸，均為海運和貿易發達的著名港口城市，這些港口城市出產獨具地域特色的貨物，這些貨物都和那個時代的民風民俗以及地理位置密切相關，玩家在遊戲中可以將商品從原產地採購之後販賣到其他城市賣出以賺取利潤，從而體驗到世界各地的特產和風土人情。

2.	獨創的股票式交易系統，瞬息萬變的買賣價格：
在遊戲中，所有的貨物價格均由玩家行為決定，玩家一段時間內的密集行為可能會造成遊戲中交易貨物價格的快速波動。如大量玩家短期內買入同一種貨物，可能會造成該貨物價格的飆升；同理，如果大量玩家在短期內售出同一種貨物，該貨物的價格可能會出現暴跌。貨物的價格每過60秒鐘刷新一次，瞬息萬變的緊張感，會使玩家在遊戲中得到極大的刺激。

3.	豐富的社會關係，縱橫交錯，情感昇華：
遊戲中有著豐富的社會關係系統，如好友系統、敵對系統、公會系統等，玩家通過各種系統與不同的玩家產生聯繫，如不同陣營之間的對抗；被敵對玩家攻擊之後的呼救；幫助被攻擊的玩家脫險；同陣營玩家合力擊敗BOSS等。豐富的社會關係盡可能模擬真實的社交體驗，讓玩家在遊戲中的情感得到昇華。

4.	跨服戰場，尋找最強王者：
在遊戲中，獨特的跨服伺服器機制，使得所有伺服器的玩家資料可以匯總到一起，所有伺服器的玩家可以在同一個戰場內協助和對抗，揮灑熱血，快意恩仇。跨服競賽的總冠軍可以得到所有伺服器玩家的共同景仰。

5.	對歷史時代的忠實還原：
在文藝復興之後，由於地理大發現，財富刺激了商業的繁榮和技術的進步，使得以前從未有過的跨洋貿易變成了可能，於是，一個大航海的時代來臨了。
在遊戲中，從文字描述到美術風格，都忠實的還原了大航海時代的歷史風貌，隨處可見的地中海風格的建築，以及遠洋的亞洲和拉美風情，都是遊戲製作者充分考究和大量參考之後的作品，更不用說那些耳熟能詳的航海家們，將給玩家帶來極大的代入感。

summary: 航海霸業是一款RPG手機遊戲，以歐洲地理大發現和大航海時代為背景，還原了波瀾壯闊的大航海時代，地圖囊括西歐、北歐。玩家可以通過貿易升級，通過戰鬥製造更好的大船

recentChanges:
船長
·新增船長【傳奇】海上薔薇·安妮、【傳奇】海上薔薇·瑪麗，這兩位船長將在不久後開放招募
·現在可以在【技能一覽】介面中查看專屬船長技能的資訊
·更新了船長【大衛·鐘斯】的美術形象

貨物
·【羅馬】新增貨物【伏特加】【魚子醬】，現在可以通過配方解鎖這兩個貨物

道具
·新增道具【加勒比海盜旗】，使用該道具可以在加勒比海召喚大批海盜
·新增道具【加勒比訂單】，使用該道具可以立即改變加勒比所有城市的需求貨物
·這兩個道具現在有幾率在擊殺公海BOSS的獎勵中獲得

公海BOSS
·現在擊殺公海BOSS改為獲得寶箱，寶箱中能開出包括【懸賞令】在內的更多道具

綜合
·現在可以在【設置】中返回到登錄介面
·優化了對全面屏手機的適配
·現在天關掉落帆布時，不同帆布的掉率更加平均了
·修復了貨物卡配方合成在某些情況下不能正確解鎖貨物的問題
·修復了歐洲成就“獲得xx個傳奇船長”不能正常完成的問題
·修復了加勒比特產貨物在某些情況下數量為0的問題
·修復了回收道具時獲得銀幣數量顯示有誤的問題

title: Mu Origin Brasil (Free Diamond)
description:
Mu Origin Brasil 7.0 (Monta De Versão)

- Dez anos atrás, Mu se tornou um MMO 3D. Atualmente, [Mu Mobile] seguirá esse clássico, oficialmente de volta! Com o design do Unity3D, criando o poderoso mundo da fantasia, O herói da imortalidade. Mu imortal, honrando 5 classes.

- Prepare-se para a experiência Full 3D EPIC MMORPG! Mobile MMORPG nunca será o mesmo! Experimente um emocionante MMORPG em tempo real que permite embarcar em uma jornada de fantasia épica. Conhecer amigos, criar festas, e se preparam para lutar contra o mal em um vasto mundo aberto para trazer de volta a tranquilidade.

[NOVOS RECURSOS ATRATIVOS]
- Novo sistema renascido
- Abra o novo VIP 15
- Novas asas 7,0
- Muitos novos acessórios
- Adicione alguns recursos aparecer
- Festival semanal do evento
- Atualize mais mapas Cross-Server 14,15 Rebirth
- Montagens de sistema e montagens de moda
- O sistema Salvador
- sistema de armadura
- E muitos mais estão esperando por você para explorar .........

[DETALHE]
O jogo tem cinco protagonistas principais que reproduzem a aparência original, estatísticas, habilidades, itens baseados no original Mu:

❖ Cavaleiro das Trevas, incluindo poder e saúde.
❖ Dark Wizard é flexível e intenso com o feitiço do céu e da terra.
❖ Dark Elf é ágil com excelente alcance.
❖ Magic Knight é a combinação perfeita do poder e magia do Dark Knight e Dark Wizards.
❖ Summoner com poder mágico mágico.

- Você pode escolher e personalizar a partir de 5 classes diferentes: Dark Knight, Dark Wizard, Elfo, Magic Knight e Summoner
- Melhore suas habilidades e testemunhe a deslumbrante exibição de habilidades exclusivas de cada herói.
- Junte Diamonds, Materials, Zens e Star Essences em áreas PVP abertas! Domine e acumule todos eles!
- Você pode trocar equipar com outros jogadores através do sistema Trade.
- Áudio reage à sua manipulação do mundo para fornecer uma paisagem sonora surreal e bonita. Melhor experiente com fones de ouvido.
- All-Server Guild Corps - Junte-se a guildas que pensam como você para formar um corpo! Quanto mais nos aproximamos, mais fortes e mais prósperos seremos!
- Level-Cap Raise - Romper os limites! O nível máximo foi aumentado até 15 Rebirth 100.

Junte forças com jogadores poderosos e ganhe rivais no mundo encantador Mu hoje!

----------------------- o0o -----------------------
☏ Precisa de ajuda? Visite: https://www.facebook.com/muicarus.official
☑ Grupo Mu: https://www.facebook.com/groups/muicarus.groups/
✎ Website: http://brasil.mu

Control is not necessary. Design RPG! 
RPG Summer Masters!
Develop the strongest character with simple manipulation!
Use and grow a variety of 100 characters strategically!

Game Features

Repetitive growth through automatic warfare regeneration.

2. Play daily missions, acquire items and grow characters!

Game Components

2) Ranking system, infinite growth stage

title: Gangster Legend
description:
"Gangster Legend", an underworld crime RPG masterpiece, a game of guns, domination, power, money and organized crime. As the main protagonist, you will set off on a grand journey to revenge for the death of your father and install yourself as the godfather of the leading mafia family in this criminals’ heaven, the vice city. Dive into criminals’ world: assassinate your enemies on streets, make money via casino, secure your position as godfather, rule with your iron fist and train your future successor. The future of a mafia kingdom lies in every decision you make.

Game Features:
1. Capo System
Hundreds of unique capos will risk their lives to help you complete revenge and become the godfather of the underworld

2. Beauty System
Dozens of different styles of beauties are available for you to choose, making you linger in the tender land

3. Smuggling System
Gangsters also have a knack of making money. While travelling all over the world and making deals with gang forces worldwide, attractive rewards await your participation

4. Patrolling System
While patrolling, you will find various beauties, get acquainted with sworn brothers, trigger mysterious events and get a variety of rewards

5. Hall of Fame System
Popularity PK in the Hall of Fame, record your exclusive glory moments

6. Alliance System
Join the Alliance members to build the strongest alliance and challenge the mysterious Alliance Instance

7. Feast System
A relaxing and leisurely feast, which enables you to be intoxicated with luxury

8. Instance System
The rise of a once decadent man, from taking over the crumbling family to becoming a godfather, until reaching the pinnacle of power

title: 網紅絕對計劃---橙光
description:
你本是一名網紅，大學畢業因為不想被老媽安排當會計（ー_ー）！！毅然决然投身娛樂圈事業！當然你真正的目的是成為一個閃耀的星，一顆能被他注視的星！
緋聞、黑料、陷害、被踩、潑臟水、潛規則接踵而至。且看妳如何壹壹應對，漂亮翻身！
調教霸道總裁，勾搭全民偶像，虐戀黑手黨BOSS。就是這麽任性！
且看小小網紅的奮鬥修煉計劃，絕對引爆娛樂圈，站在星途頂端！下面繁體字按鈕進行在線轉換

title: Escalator Survival
description:
A basic Role Play Game which you have to survive the phases of the escalators. 
The escalator is in reverse direction and others don’t work. To save your partner you need to quickly climb the escalators and avoid any obstacles comes in between. 

As the level increases the obstacles increases. 

Each level has it own Uniqueness their time, their characters, the level of Difficulties, and many more.

•	Cute Characters.	
•	Interactive graphics.
•	Challenging levels.

title: 天龍破
description:
《天龍破》延續戰、法、道“鐵三角”的職業設定，還原PK爆裝、自由交易等經典系統，帶妳重溫熟悉的瑪法大陸！

* 更強更熱血，最新新資料片發布
轉生系統正式開啟，個人BOSS、高級地圖、元寶紅包助妳全方位體驗經典玩法。競技PK，不看戰力看實力，年度新版本上線，多重驚喜等妳體驗！

* 野外自由式PK，裝備寶石爆屏
野外全地圖任意PK，多重模式助戰，寶石掉落、整件爆裝，無論團戰還是單打，壹定讓妳玩得痛快、撿得滿意！

* 全開放式交易，不花錢玩賺人生
遊戲內具備拍賣行、擺攤、面交，全開放式自由交易，真正做到能玩更能賺，讓妳不用花錢也能制霸全區！

title: ShoGun Dungeons
description:
Prolog:

Long ago,
there was a country governed by the SHO-GUN in the sky towering castle.

But one day,
the era of long-lasting peace suddenly ended.

The SHO-GUN sold his soul to the DEVIL,
and dark clouds began looming over the world.

Before long, demons manipulated by the SHO-GUN began to attack people. The SHO-GUN was trying to collect their spirits, so called "MABUI" to enhance his own power.

But there was hope.
A boy who miraculously escaped stood up to the danger.

This game is about the adventure of this boy.

Let's get back the "MABUI" and beat the SHO-GUN together!!



Features:

- Roguelike gameplay with 50+ equipments

- Cool stylized low poly, very unique graphics!

-Japanese characters like Samurai, Ninja, Oni,
 and Shogun  appear in this game

-Kawaii and cute characters designed

-But, It became a little boring game system... 
 Please click ads in game for updating systems!



Caution!:

This game may show black screen on boot. (Android Oreo 8.0.)
In that case, please try to manage or check app permissions.
So, do not deny app permissions.

title: Blood Hustle RPG
description:
Blood Hustle is a brand new free to play RPG packed with awesome features and a great community!

This app is optimized for mobile devices. 
Alternatively you can also play on your computer by going to www.bloodhustle.com

You’ll have a chance at making it to the top and becoming the Top Hustler! 

In Blood Hustle there are a load of exciting things to help you make your way to the top and you can choose your own path!

Here are some of the great features you can find in Blood Hustle: 

• Become a Gang Leader or join an existing one and wage wars against your rivals.
• Wide range of Crimes to do which will help you make some money and progress in the game.
• Casino with some great games like Blackjack, Video Poker, Roulette, Slots and a Multiplayer Texas Hold’em.
• Racing Scene, where you can buy a car, tune it up and compete in individual challenges and in Tournaments.
• Chat and Shoutbox to chat away with the rest of the community.
• A wide range of Multiplayer Games where you can challenge your friends for cash of just plain old fun.
• There’s a great Customer Service team always ready to help!
• Horse and Dog Races in which you can take part after buying a pet! Train it and turn your pet into a winner.
• Full blown Property Market where you can own several properties and rent them out for some extra income.
• Gang Properties with benefits to all members!
• Mystery and Luxury items to collect!
• Badges to unlock!
• Create your own Company and run it how you see fit, hopefully making some money out of it.
• Stock Market where you can trade stocks and make a killing.
• Arcade Games with trophies for highest scores.
• And so much more!!! There is just too much to list!

Blood Hustle will most definitely provide you some quality entertainment and moments of great fun! So, what are you waiting for? Sign up now for this awesome role playing game and grab your chance to make it to the top!

title: Virtual Farmer Happy Family Simulator Game
description:
Fun holidays season is going to end soon and happy family members wants some holidays camping at hillside farm locations and want to be a virtual farmer. In this family fun farming game you will go to hillside farm and checkout your virtual farm. At the start of virtual farm games the virtual mom and virtual dad is ready along with virtual nanny and triplet babies. Little kids are also happy for the virtual farming trip in Virtual Farmer Happy Family Simulator Game. Have and experience of realistic virtual farm environment as farmer of beautiful farmer village or professional tractor driver of ultimate family along with combine harvester which will perform farming tasks with your tractor. Ready to start plow farming along farmer simulator from virtual farming simulation game and perform various farming activities to comfort his virtual farm family in happy family home.

Go to the countryside area and have a life of a family farmer in family fun holidays. This virtual happy family simulation game provides the ultimate in realistic farming experiences along with virtual dad and mommy. In virtual farm games start performing multiple virtual farmer family activities in your massive farm, such as storing the hay, delivering crops to the storage house on your large tractor trolley and take care of farm animals. My family farm in the virtual farm games has many farming missions to explore in it with on Virtual Farmer Happy Family Simulator Game.

The virtual dad is a farmer and the virtual mom and kids help their parents with the fun farm activities. Having a family farm is a virtual happy family experience and only people from countryside outlandish farm area can relate to that. But that will not to stop the people living in the city to imagine what it'd be like having a family farm. Virtual Farm Games is the just the best simulation game to help you go into the farming world for some time. Enjoy your summer vacations with your happy family in this family simulator game and live in beautiful cottage at big farmer shed with lush green grass and open world farming fields. This family game is the most realistic farmer RPG game with extraordinary detail of farming activities.

Virtual Farmer Happy Family Simulator Game Features:

- Enjoy summer holidays at open world hillside farming area.
- Experience the realistic life of a farmer & have farming fun along your family.
- Complete all farming tasks in given time & unlock next family game mission.
- Amazing countryside & hillside farms area to explore.
- Easy controls & beautiful 3D graphics also having HD gameplay.
- Village life with typical farming games sound effects.
- Stunning virtual farm for different tasks with mom, dad and kids.

title: Fashion Dress Up Game : Clothes, Dresses, Makeups
description:
🌸 PLAY FASHION DRESS UP GAME: Clothes, Dresses, Makeups 🌸
✨ World's first realistic dress up, makeup, shopping and coloring game. Play with your friends and message with them! Get likes, earn score, edit your profile, be popular a queen in server and take your gifts! Be in first 100 people who play the game and take ''special prom night dress gift!'' 

👚 Outfits: Dress, clothes, skirt, shorts, cardigan, jackets, gloves, blouse, tshirt, costumes, suits
👙 Underwear: painties, bra, sock, swimsuits
👠 Accessories: Wings, hat, headsets, princess crowns, belt, glasses, ties, shoes, bag, hand accessories
💄 Makeup: Lipstick, blusher, eyeliner, eyeshadows, eyelash, mascara, nail polish
🌹 Tattoo: Hand, face, leg, arm, neck, chest, ankle tattoo, mask
👱 Hairstyles: hair, postiche
💍 Jewelry: Earrings, rings, necklace, anklet, bracelet, piercing
👗 Full fashion outfit costumes and backgrounds, high image quality
💃 Girl models, Pinch Zoom
👍 Get Likes
🏬 Go Shopping
🎨 Coloring like tailor
👤 Personal profile
👜 Inventory
📛 Badges, titles
👥 Play with friends 
💬 Social chat system

😚 DRESSES, HAIR, MAKEUP, JEWERLY, COLOR, MANY MODELS, BACKGROUNDS 😍
Dress up your girl. Many option for dresses. Daily, evening, pyjamas, superstar, prom dresses, princess, style like  queen. Fantastic, elegant dress up game for girls. More outfit and accessories will come soon! This is just a begining for fashion design.

💎SHOPPING & BLUEGEM💎
Go shopping and buy outfits, clothes, accessories ,makeups, hairs with bluegem. Shopping place is panaromic, fashionable and realistic like 3d. Buy dresses, accessories, tattoo, makeups, jewelry, outfit costumes and more you want.

💖LIKE SYSTEM & SP (Style Point)💖
Be popular and first in server with your likes and sp. Earn more sp with your total like. Take and give likes, earn points!

🎁EARN OUTFITS🎁
Get new outfits and earn clothes by completing tasks or with event. New outfits, hairstyles, makeups  to be added on a weekly basis, for you can catch up to new trends. Countless fairy tales clothes and  fashion makeup types with unlimited colors option.

🎨FREE COLORING🎨
Paint to hair, eye, lipstick, mascara, eyeliner, nail, some part of clothes, all makeup parts can coloring.

🎮FASHION DRESS UP GAME: Clothes, Dresses, Makeups🎮
♦️ Sign to dress up game.
♦️ Pick a gorgeous profile picture for your profile.
♦️ Choose a girl and start to dress up.
♦️ Wear elegant dresses & dress up , make your hair, wear accessories, makeup to face.
♦️ Design your colors for hair, eye, nail, makeup & customize. 
♦️ Customize your look,  clothes with countless combinations & colors.
♦️ When finish dressing up pick a background for your fashion nova.
♦️ Save your girl combination in inventory.
♦️ Start to earn likes! don't forget to like other player's combines for earn more likes!
♦️ Add friends, share your dressing skills with chat..
♦️ Invite friends and play together this games for girls.
♦️ Don't forget to follow other player's fashion career and show your own dressing style.
♦️ Take a photo of the dressed girl and share on social media for get more like!

🏆REWARDS🏆
You can be first, second or third in server with likes and earn queen, princess and lady crown dresses kits, title, badges. Weekly events give points, bluegem and special  wearable clothing and make up, hair, accessories reward for girls.

👤PROFILE & INVENTORY👤
Player have got own special profile. Changable profile picture. Inventory contain player's saved dress combines.

👋FRIEND AND REAL TIME CHAT👋
Add other players as friend. You play this game with your Facebook, Instagram, Twitter or other social media friends. Also you can send message like chat.

🔔NOTIFICATIONS🔔
Player can follow friend's activity.

-
♦️Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1768159489899008/
♦️Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fs.games/
Our Service mailbox: contact@fsgamestudio.com

title: Empire of fashion, Dress up And Makeup
description:
If you are into makeover games, you will love this fashion game. And if you are not into makeover games, this one will change definitly your mind! 
   Dress up and makeup famous fashion girls . Be fashion stylist and make beautiful makeovers in your shop! Get access to a lot of hot tops, skirts, shoes, clothes, and accessories and create incredible looks and perfect outfits !
   Conquer the empire of fashion and be creative - create fashion makeovers and stunning looks. Show us your talent in dress up and cover fashion world with your
dress up and be a fashion designer stylist. If you are a lover of dress up and makeup games, then this game is for you. It will help you to think as an international fashion stylist in a fashion fantasy world!
   No more words, install this makeover game and conquer empire of fashion with your creative and stunning looks! Make any girl or model georgous in your shop with

title: 王牌製片人
description:
2018年首款影視主題模擬經營手遊正式登陸！
體驗從未有過的電影公司經營樂趣，現在就開始享受吧。
我們的口號是：培養中意明星，拍攝大賣電影！

超多明星 自由招募 全面培養
在遊戲中，有近百位明星可供招募，成熟型、青春型、演技派、偶像派……各種類型、各種風格、各種國籍的明星應有盡有，製片人們可以挑選各種自己喜歡的明星，進行悉心培養，演技、表演、場面、藝術、娛樂多種屬性節節看漲，特殊技能彰顯才華，為拍出大賣電影打下最堅實的基礎。
豐富劇本 各類電影 任意拍攝
勵志、奇幻、仙俠、穿越、科幻、警匪……
動作、敘事、懸疑、愛情、恐怖、喜劇……
所有的題材，所有的類型的電影，在這裡都可以找到，超多劇本可以供各位作人製來選擇拍攝，製片人可以通過結合市場的需求，放大電影中的某些元素，確定題材和宣傳方向，讓票房大賣更加容易唷~
劇本按照稀有度，分為一到五星，相同的劇本可以拍攝續作，三星以上的劇本還可以進行改編，嘗試在同一劇本下進行……在這裡，有無限的可能，製片人們永遠不會感到枯燥。
立足市場 發展粉絲 票房大賣
想要拍出大賣電影，當然少不了市場宣傳啦。
在遊戲中，各位製片人可以在熟悉的城市進行市場佔領，從而獲得粉絲和金幣，提升自己影視公司和旗下藝人的等級，同時，還能夠獲取豐富的城市物產。
提到粉絲，自然也少不了粉絲們對周邊的需求，也離不開粉絲和明星們的各種有趣的故事。滿足粉絲們的需求，將電影周邊送給他們，讓粉絲代表和明星進行會面，可以提升公眾對下一部電影的期待值，從而獲取更多的票房唷！
電影大亨 影視公司 掌上經營
想要經營好一個影視公司，可不是一件簡單的事唷。除了培養藝人、挑選合適的劇本、拍攝大賣電影、滿足粉絲需求之外，自然還有其他的公司的業務要進行處理。
在遊戲中，製作人們可以找到自己志同道合的朋友，進行合作，共同完成任務，領取豐厚的獎勵；
也可以和合作公司進行商務會議，通過談判的手段爭取更高利潤；
當然，如果製片人們的公司足夠優秀，還可以進入股市，獲取更多收益唷~
您有遊戲相關問題嗎？我們非常樂意為您解決遊戲中遇到的任何問題，請及時和我們聯繫唷！
Email：cs.wp@gamemorefun.com
Facebook官方粉絲專頁：https://www.fb.com/TheProducer.MFG
——請注意——
本遊戲需要網路連線
本遊戲為免費使用，遊戲內另提供購買虛擬遊戲幣、物品等付費服務。
請注意遊戲時間，不可沉迷遊戲唷

House Cleaning - Keeping Clean includes washing and cleaning shelves. Repair and fix the broken pipes like a plumber. Use best plumbing and repairing skills to fix the damaged pipes. Kitchen dishes are messy! Little princess clean up and wash the plates, glass and spoons using dish washer. Wash the dishes and shine them up. After dish washing arrange the dishes in the rack. with this House Cleaning - Keeping Clean It's no secret that keeping your home clean and neat requires a great deal of time and energy, whether you live in a one-bedroom apartment or a four-bedroom house. These days, our schedules are so busy that it takes real dedication to set aside enough time for a thorough top-to-bottom cleaning. There are some cleaning tools available to you and you just have to get rid of this mess quickly! As we have many games girls this awesome game includes three cleaning stages, or three rooms that need to be cleaned.

 Right after you will be assigned to take care of the bathroom matter. Try some useful tricks and remove those stubborn stains that are on the toilet and in the bath tube. title: Flower Girl - Flower Growup
description:
The girls, I heard that the town came up with a florist who is very good at planting flowers. She has a magical garden where any flower can flourish and bloom. All the flowers in the castle are picked from here. She also makes a variety of bouquets, flower perfume and accessories which are very popular and become a popular fashion element pursued by all girls. She is now the image spokesperson of the town.let us help her dress up and make her as beautiful as a flower fairy. You can also learn from the florist to grow the seeds into beautiful flowers, and then make your favorite ornaments in her flower shop.

Feature：
1. Choose the flower you like and start planting. Ensure that the light, fertilizer, and water are sufficient, and it is necessary to kill insects and pick them in time. Tell you a secret, you can plant a variety of flowers at a time, thus you can make your flower shelf more eye-catching
2. Start designing the bouquet. Different flowers have different flower words, and each bouquet represents your inspiration. Design a favorite bouquet, you can enjoy it yourself, or you can give it to someone you like.
3. Pick your favorite flower designs some necklaces, earrings and perfumes.
4. The florist regularly grows flowers in the garden every day, and she has very little time to take in deep skin care. We need to help her wash her face and 
5. Match the best looking clothes for her.Don't need to be gorgeous, but one must match her temperament.
6. The flower shop has been expanding, using your imagination to decorate the room into the most sophisticated flower shop in the town.

title: LONELY HERO & Non-Fight Party
description:
【Lonely hero saves the world!?】
The party who should beat the evil together  spend a lot of their time at the casino and the bar!
Hero's lonely journey now begins...


★How to play★

"Hero part"
①Let's destroy the monsters in the area and destroy the boss.
②Upgrade your weapon with the material you got from the boss and proceed to the next area.

"Bum part"
①Let's challenge a mini game and get money and EXP.
②Let's raise the upper limit for the amount you can earn by level up.


★Tips for capture★

"Hero part"
●Tap the "fight" button repeatedly to speed up the time to next attack.
⇒Defeating monster quickly, the reward will increase.
⇒Defeating monster quickly, both damage and recovery costs can be reduced.

"Bum part"
●Don't miss the timing when the luck comes.
⇒As stockable lucks are limited, try to challenge the mini game right away.
●Don't be afraid of losing and let's try to challenge the double up.
⇒Since double up does not consume luck, it's a chance to earn EXP.

title: Easy 5e Dice
description:
Set your characters stats in different profiles and automatically roll skill and your own custom made checks, or just use the simple dice functions.

Features:
-Dice: D4,D6,D8,D10,D12,D20 and your own custom dice.
-Dice roll quantity from 1 to 40 dice at the same time

-Set your own Fifth Edition(5e) stats(STR,DEX,CON,INT,WIS,CHA,PROF,HITD) from 1 to 99
-Set proficiencies on skill checks and save checks

-Make custom rolls that use your set stats

-Save everything on up to four different profiles



Enjoy and good luck!
If you have any suggestions do not hesitate to post a review or send me an email.

title: Mu World Mobile
description:
Os MMORPGs de smartphones nunca mais serão os mesmos desde a incrível experiência de MU WORLD MOBILE.

Nessa versão você contará com 5 classes:

- (Guerreiro): Espadachim exibindo sua habilidade e esgrima lutando com o oponente, um personagem cheio de cavalheirismo.

- (Mágico): Agarre o poder misterioso, com diversas magias que são invencíveis e coloque medo no inimigo.

- (Arqueira):Uma elfa que nasceu maravilhosamente, equipada com uma flecha letal, habilidades impressionantes e um poder de uma sacerdotisa.

- (Duel Master): Um espadachim que controla o poder das trevas, capaz de equipar armas de espadachim e magicas. Pode escolher se especializar força ou magia.

- (Convocadora): Invocadores, cuja linhagem foi preservada desde os tempos antigos, possuem um dom natural em manipular poderes mágicos e se comunicar com outro mundo.

Cada personagem contendo habilidades e características únicas.
Equipe seu personagem com inúmeros tipos de armadura, armamentos, pets, fantasias, asas e muito mais!
E aí vai ficar de fora dessa?

title: ShinNaZuki-Hatsune Miku Collab！
description:
[Orthodox Japanese RPG -- Absolute Audiovisual Feast]
--- Six major floating island adventures for super interaction: 
The chapter story line takes you to experience multiple worlds, and 
the million-word story takes you to explore the grand world view.
--- Fantasy beautiful background music for super sense: 
Background music is carefully produced by Japanese music master Hitoshi Sakimoto!

[A number of Popular Voices - Listening to the Voice of Guardian]
--- Super popular voice actor "Hanazawa Kana" as the "Voice Ambassador" 
together with many top voice actor"Kimura Ryouhei", "Hayami Saori", 
"Fukuen Misato""Horie Yui" create the voice of the guardian. 
Many voice actor dubbing entirely, and more,sound interaction at intimate scene .
--- Hatsune Miku broken wall to collaborate with Hanazawa Kana,
 the two loveliest sang the theme song "ShinNaZuki".
More cute sounds waiting for you to listen!

[Reputed Painter Create Characters--Playing a variety of Modeling]
--- "Bloodline" Art Team and Japanese well-known painter Zuzuhira Hiro,
 Mikimoto Haruhiko, Nekonabe Ao carefully drawn the characters, hundreds of 
painted characters can visually feel strong personality shaping.Unique and stunning picture 
not only can make pictorial book, but also give the player a huge sense of imagination.
--- Gorgeous fashion free to change in girls dream closet. Spoiled, Crying, Shy...
Character expressions are vivid and varied, and a variety of styles are free to match.

[Multiple Innovative Gameplay-- Real time PVP Battle]
--- Single manipulating more than 40 kinds of character combinations, 
Warriors, Archer, Assassins, Mages, Cleric, the five major occupations, 
completely non-repetitive character characteristics and skill effects. 
The shackles and combinations between the characters also affect the battle!
--- Using professional restraint to carry out pre-war deployments, using various 
brain-burning tactics such as back-attacks, combos and positions to break the enemy one by one.
 The fun of the game is more indicative of the player's Strategy&Tactics!
--- Real-time PVP battle, multiplayer build team to fight against the world BOSS, 
Guild War, Party Trial, Magic Cards, Star Ladder, Mystryland, etc.! 
The PvP system also has different classifications, Captain War, Trap battles, etc., 
Not just need to consider the lineup, Scene Position is also an important factor affecting the battle!

Guild War, Party Trial, Magic Cards, Star Ladder, Mystryland, etc.!
The PvP system also has different classifications, Captain War, Trap battles, etc.,
Not just need to consider the lineup, Scene Position is also an important factor affecting the battle!
summary: "ShinNaZuki× Hatsune Miku" is a Japanese Anime, super-interactive, RPG Game.
developerAddress: 香港元朗大棠於驗北路46號習家嘉園D3樓F1554室
recentChanges: Welcome to ShinNaZuki!!!

title: 雄霸天下-傳奇來了
description:
《雄霸天下》是一款MMOPRG傳奇類經典手遊大作，遊戲原汁原味的還原了傳奇1.76的經典玩法，野外掛機打怪練級，搶BOSS爆裝備，沙巴克萬人線上激情PK爭奪皇宮。玩家可以在遊戲的虛擬世界中與同伴盡情冒險，成就一個強者的成長之路。遊戲畫質精美，玩法多樣，運行流暢，帶給玩家各種酣暢淋漓的遊戲體驗和樂趣。本產品研發團隊秉承以用戶為本的開發理念，深入各類用戶群體中進行深度調研，知用戶所想，圓用戶所求，採用了大量絢麗的寫實場景，提供了別具特色的幫會戰，特色副本，極品裝備系統，英雄合擊系統，符文系統等，讓遊戲與眾不同。
     玩家可以在本遊戲中征戰天下，鷹擊長空，廣結豪強，戎馬稱雄。
     我們的目標是讓用戶玩得開心、玩得放心。
     精英團隊，完美構架，傾力打造，必為精品。

精英團隊，完美構架，傾力打造，必為精品。
summary: 雄霸天下開啟傳奇紀元，還原最經典傳奇。
developerAddress: 浙江省，杭州市，滨江区

title: Magical Furry Adventure
description:
This is an optimized and better version of my old RPG Maker MV test game which is no longer available.

There are absolutely NO ADS in this game, enjoy.

New stuff in this version includes:

-Much better FPS on older devices (from 5 to 60 fps in some cases).
-Minor battle system enhancements.
-Reduced file size.
-Start with a few items to make the beginning easier.

Story:

Follow the epic quest of 2 completely random people to save the world from the ultimate evil and their search for a magical furry.

Controls:

-Two finger tap to go back / open the menu.
-One tap to move, select etc.

Although it is much more optimized than the original version it is still recommended to play on a relatively new device for the best experience.

title: Man or Vampire
description:
Paradise: a mysterious world where dead souls gathers. Now that the end of the paradise is imminent because of the vampires who were ruling the frontiers, only the king of the paradise can save it from the crisis. Now, an adventure is to become the king of the paradise begins.

[Game Features]

● Strategic Combat
Your own creative strategic battle by using the terrains in turn-based battles. The battles are carried out in a party-play basis, and the aspects of the battle will change depending on the positions and terrains of the party that you have configured. In addition, skills of your companions are the main factor that affects in the battle.
         
● Suspicious Dungeon Progress
Man or Vampire contains various dungeons that are created randomly. Map exploration is essential in order to escape a dungeon. Beware of the dungeon boss, that appears out of nowhere and threaten you from escaping. Don’t worry, items and equipment will help you progress throughout the dungeon.
         
● Recruit Companions with Various Skills
Recruit your companions who will go on an adventure with you. Different in skills and classes that create uniqueness from each character. You can train your companions to become stronger through various contents that include affinity, monster element, party research, etc.

● Develop Main Character
Grow your Champion. Our main character is special, that states as both human and vampire. You can change job whenever you want, and learn advanced skills from your companions. You can enjoy the game in various ways depending on how you utilize your main character.

#Top10: Google Indie Game Festival 2017
#Invited to: MWU Festival 2017
#Ranked 2: Game Creation Audition 2017

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts to everyone who loves Man or Vampire!
Your precious reviews help us to develop the game.

Email: hideacorp@gmail.com


[Access Permissions Guide]

● Mandatory Access Permissions Guide
[Storage Space Permission (Required)] - This permission is needed to install the game and save the game data.
[Audio and Camera Access (Required)] - This permission is necessary to use the game recording & image attachment features in the Naver Cafe function.


# How to revoke access
- OS 6.0 or later: Settings> Application Manager> Select app> Permissions > Revoke Access Permissions
- Below O.S 6.0: Cannot revoke access permissions, so you have to delete the app altogether to revoke access.

title: Phantomgate : The Last Valkyrie
description:
Enter Phantomgate, where a mystical adventure RPG awaits you in the fabled land of Midgard! Help Astrid, a daring young Valkyrie, save her mother from the clutches of the mad god, Odin, and discover her true hidden powers along the way. Explore a strange, new realm in this Norse Mythology-inspired game, befriending and collecting hundreds of unique Phantoms to help fight by your side.

Journey between worlds, solving challenging puzzles and engaging in strategic turn-based battles with Phantoms ranging from small, cat-like critters to intimidating Orc warriors. Take down the darkness that threatens Midgard and all who inhabit it!
Rekindle the excitement of classic RPG adventure titles, and discover the secrets that lie beyond the mysterious Phantomgate!


GAME FEATURES:
• Explore lush, Nordic-inspired landscapes while unlocking the magical powers hidden deep within the ancient world.
• Help unravel the story of Astrid’s mysterious past as you uncover an unforgettable, emotional tale.
• Solve puzzles to unlock long-forgotten secrets as you journey across the 6 regions of Midgard, from icy tundras to deep forests.
• Engage in epic combat against Odin’s dark forces! Strategically drag buff bubbles to teammates and enemies alike to turn the tide of battle in this unique twist on classic turn-based RPG combat.
• Collect over 300 unique Phantom companions to fight alongside you. Choose how your Phantoms evolve into powerful new forms with special elemental items. Choose what will shape your adventure, your Phantoms, and help save the land of Midgard!

[Access Permission Guide]

# Camera Access Permission
 - Used for AR functions.

* Available on tablet devices.

# How to Withdraw Access Permission
- Operating Systems 6.0 or higher: Settings > Apps > Select App > Permissions > Toggle App Permissions on/off
- Operating Systems prior to 6.0: Access rights cannot be configured in the settings menu. Withdraw permission by deleting the app.

**Minimum specifications: Android OS 4.4 / 2GB+ RAM

※ This app offer in-app purchases. You can disable this feature by adjusting your device’s settings.
 
By downloading this game, you are agreeing to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play.
 - Terms of Service: http://help.netmarble.com/policy/terms_of_service.asp?locale=en
 - Privacy Policy: http://help.netmarble.com/policy/privacy_policy.asp?locale=en

title: Jade Dynasty Mobile
description:
Free-form mounted exploration!
Boundless scenic 3d flight with no height restrictions, fly anywhere you want!
Do not feel like exploring the vast expanses of the Jade Dynasty world alone? Conquer the skies alongside your friends!

A wide array of character customization options 
Broad choice of cosmetic items and accessories at your disposal, create your own unique character!

Massive cross-server PVP battles.
4 schools — noble Jadeon mages, fearless Lupin warriors, cunning Vim swordsmen, and serene Skysong healers. Make your choice, declare a full-scale war on other clans and prove your school to be the strongest!

Advanced clan system
Your clan is your family. Have a wedding, recruit apprentices, build an amicable clan, and unlock special events!

Incredibly optimized for mobile devices HD graphics allowing full appreciation of the elaborate and vibrant landscapes.

Make your choice in the Jade Dynasty world and discover your path to immortality!

title: 야망
description:
8월 29일 2차 대규모 업데이트
▶ 신기 / 펫 / 장비 세트 추가
▶ 스킬 강화 / 돌파 / 스킬 추가
▶ 날개 / 탈것 / 캐릭터 코스튬 추가
▶ 야수 / 날개 혼 추가
▶ VIP 레벨 확장

더욱 거대해진 군단전
전체 서버간 점령전
국가간의 치열한 전쟁 모바일 MMORPG 온라인게임
거친 녀석들의 거대한 전쟁이 시작된다.

★ 게임특징 ★
▶대규모 오픈필드 국가전
이제는 국가 전투!
PvP의 새로운 획을 긋는 대규모 실시간 국가전!

▶기사의길
정통 판타지 RPG게임의 진수!
템페스트 대륙의 백마탄 기사가 되어보세요!

▶펫 시스템
더 이상 귀엽고 따라다니는 육성 펫은 그만!
나의 또 하나의 파트너이자 수호자!

▶다양한 던전과 서버대전
지긋지긋한 필드사냥은 그만! 
기량을 확인 할 수 있는 다양한 던전과 서버대전! 

▶탄탄한 세계관과 판타지 스토리
판타지세계에서 벌어지는 인간, 엘프, 드워프, 드래곤, 마족 간의 
장대한 스토리 속 주인공이 되세요!

6개 국가간의 무한배틀 전쟁게임, 그 전장속의 영웅이 되어보세요.
더욱 거대해진 MMORPG 온라인게임 군단 전쟁으로 
당신을 초대합니다.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7월 25일 1차 대규모 업데이트
▶서버대전 - 전체 서버간의 자유로운 쟁탈전
▶결혼 시스템 및 신혼 코스튬 업데이트
▶자유로운 캐릭터 직업 변경 시스템

★ 공식커뮤니티 ★
▶ 네이버공식카페: http://cafe.naver.com/snmmorpg
▶ 페이스북: https://www.facebook.com/yamang.kr
▶ 이메일: YM_help@skylinematrix.com


★앱 접근권한 안내★
▶앱 설정&저장공간
설치공간 부족 혹은 게스트로 게임에 접속할 경우, 해당 권한 승인이 필요합니다.

★접근권한 철회 방법★
▶ 안드로이드 6.0 이상: 설정 > 앱 > 권한 항목 선택 > 권한 목록 > 접근권한 동의 또는 철회 선택
▶ 안드로이드 6.0 미만: 운영체제를 업그레이드하여 접근권한을 철회하거나, 앱을 삭제

※ 권한 철회시 리소스 중단 혹은 게임 접속 불가 현상이 발생할수 있습니다.

title: Digital World: Heroes
description:
LOVE , INNCENCE , HONESTY , COURAGE , FRIENDSHIP , KNOWLEDGE , HOPE , BRIGHT! 
Evolutionary badge shines and adventure begins again！

● It's FREE to play! 
Download the game free of charge and prove that you can handle the best mission and progress system. Enjoy hours of free gameplay!

● The GAMEPLAY is great! 
Growing 3D World - regular updates with new stories, areas and monsters. 

● Hyper-bot PVP stimulate Elven's power 
New large-scale cross-service multiplayers dungeon:Dark Forest & Adventure Island. Dominate Elven land to get the resource factories and core resources with your friends.

● Abundant prizes & Unique gameplay
Arena, dungeon, trials, guilds, parkour and fishing activities are opened. Take a break from battles as you adventure that enable you to power up your monsters.

● Simple system & Cool Effect
Simple battle system! Attack by tapping the pop up effect.
descriptionHTML:
LOVE , INNCENCE , HONESTY , COURAGE , FRIENDSHIP , KNOWLEDGE , HOPE , BRIGHT!
Evolutionary badge shines and adventure begins again！

● It's FREE to play!
Download the game free of charge and prove that you can handle the best mission and progress system. Enjoy hours of free gameplay!

● The GAMEPLAY is great!
Growing 3D World - regular updates with new stories, areas and monsters.

● Hyper-bot PVP stimulate Elven's power
New large-scale cross-service multiplayers dungeon:Dark Forest & Adventure Island. Dominate Elven land to get the resource factories and core resources with your friends.

● Abundant prizes & Unique gameplay
Arena, dungeon, trials, guilds, parkour and fishing activities are opened. Take a break from battles as you adventure that enable you to power up your monsters.

● Simple system & Cool Effect
Simple battle system! Attack by tapping the pop up effect.
summary: Digital World: Heroes is a 3D   real-time game.
recentChanges:
1. Ultimate evolution launched, be the strongest tamer;
2.Hyper-bot PVP stimulate Elven's power.

title: Pocket Luna
description:
Pocket Luna – A fantasy game that takes you to an exciting and ancient world. In your travels here, you will meet new friends, collect cute pets and beasts, and fight the dark forces that lie within this world. The bright and playful art style mixes with an intricate skill system, exciting gameplay, fashionable clothes and wings, and deep social features to create an amazing fantasy world for you to explore!

Features:
-3 UNIQUE CLASSES WITH MIX-AND-MATCH SKILLS
Pocket Luna's detailed job system allows players to mix-and-match skills and abilities to create their ultimate hero!

-A VAST COLLECTIONS OF COSTUMES AND WINGS
Adorable outfits and wings to help you find the perfect style for you!

-UNLEASH THE HIDDEN POWER OF PETS
A pet in Luna is more than a simple friend. The lovely and super-cute pets are always there to cheer you up!

-FIND YOUR TRUE LOVE
Join us in Pocket Luna to find and marry your special someone! Build friendships and romances that will last a lifetime!


Follow Pocket Luna for more!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PocketLuna.en/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/pocketluna_xdg
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pocketluna/

title: Emperor And Beauties
description:
Emperor and Beauties is a super interesting game!
Experience the royal life of ancient China.
Are you ready to enjoy the journey to be an Emperor?
The fascinating plots will lead you to travel the ancient oriental world where Marco Polo visited thousand years ago.
You have to survive from the battles with Barbarians, conspiracies from the competitors. Most important thing, purpose those beauties by different methods and make as many offspring as possible to build your Empire.

Emperor system
Started from a poor family. How do you become the Emperor? Take that crown! The people hail your rule!

Beauty system
Men are born to be amorous. Over 50 different style beauties, would you manage to conquer them? Your lovers, they are eager for your love. Have some fun with them and enjoy the romantic time.

Children system
Enjoy the process of raising your children and make them married with other players'. They will be of great benefit to your power.

Guild system
Ally with others to defeat the enemies. Wars will end in ashes someday but friendship lasts forever. Make friends around the world online right now!

Retainer system
The generals come to serve you. Be your sword and be your shield. They protect the realm in your lead.

For more information and free gift code. 
Please search ‘Emperor and Beauties’ on Facebook and follow us.

https://www.facebook.com/com.heyyogame.gden/

title: 真趙雲無雙 - 經典正版三國遊戲
description:
【遊戲特色】
完美的將領養成體系，龐大的卡牌對戰系統，隨意的武將組合設定，新穎的城池攻占模式，為您呈現引人入勝的遊戲體驗，營造一個傲視群雄、奪取威名的三國世界。

《回合戰鬥，經典再現》
首款海外版真趙云無雙迴合手游，受到百萬玩家真實好評，體驗經典三國劇情，打造最強三國戰隊！將回合進行到底，讓經典更加好玩，給你全新超強的三國回合製遊戲體驗。謀略作為的核心元素之一，引入了經典“三十六計”以及獨特兵書技能效果，將每個兵書技能效果融入到每一場戰役、每一場戰鬥中。想要打贏勝仗，就必須懂得兵書技能的合理使用，運籌帷幄。

《放置挂機，用不完的洪荒之力》
徹底解放你的雙手，讓你輕輕鬆松玩，絕對不落人後!! 攻城、升級、爆裝備永不停歇！戰爭一觸即發，不需要你一直點擊，只需一點釋放大招，邊做事邊升級，做事娛樂兩不耽誤。


《英雄上陣熱血搏殺，創新技能進階升級》
每位英雄在戰場上都有自己的獨特定位和獨有技能，一次時機合適的技能施放足以改變整場戰鬥的結果。英雄的技能都可以進階升級，只要滿足了技能進階所需的屬性條件，就可以在原有技能的基礎上進一步提陞技能效果。

《百戰千軍，逐鹿中原》
創新國戰玩法，場面恢弘，爭奪王位，一將功成。真正實時戰鬥體驗，浴血奮戰趣味非凡！每位三國英雄在塔防戰場上都有自己的獨特定位和獨有技能，您可以控制他們主動出擊，施放強力技能，與兵將配合，消滅大波敵軍。知己知彼百戰不殆，想要達到巔峰戰場境界，就需要掌握兵種選擇，兵種的相生相剋關係，同樣的兵種不同的陣型搭配，都會產生巨大的變化，戰場形勢瞬息萬變，唯有靈活應對方為上策。

《演武之爭，角逐四方至尊之首》
想要一舉成名嗎？ ！想要征戰四方嗎？ ！遊戲中設有演武至尊榜挑戰，爭奪首位，不斷挑戰其他玩家，威望及聲譽稱霸全服！演武至尊，等你來挑戰！
原汁原味，三國經典再現武將隨心搭配 打開遊戲新體驗 精心設計的特色武將，多角度滿足三國迷的名將情懷；百種武將獲取方式、獨特的武將緣分搭配，讓每個武將都有用武之地。

《群戰單挑，最強戰鬥體驗》
三國戰役經典還原 歷史將由你的加入而改變 重現歷史經典戰役，感受獨特的定制關卡體驗。靈活調整戰術、掌握釋放技能時機即可過關斬將重寫歷史。
千人同屏的實時國戰，親身體會金戈鐵馬的史詩城戰，鬥智斗勇，或用陰謀詭計，或出絕世騎兵，或用團隊配合，盡顯策略樂趣.

《萬人國戰，群雄三國爭霸》
江山誰得，歷史格局再現，完美承襲三國世界觀。史無前例​​的複雜版圖和超多玩法全面開發，王者之城虛位以待，你準備好了嗎？
上略伐智，下略伐勢。真實演繹戰爭中的生存法則，聯盟間遠交近攻，與勁敵鬥智斗勇。以外交，壯大我勢！以謀略，奪取王權！

《兄弟連心，其利斷金》
豈曰無衣，與子同袍！在遊戲中，你可以自由發表言論，結交好友，一起攻守城池。這不是你一個人的遊戲，這是一群人的國度與熱血征戰！萬人國戰露鋒芒，你還不快來義結英豪，征戰四方？

《三國美人齊聚，等你來撩》
三國美人伴你左右，陪你征服三國，味美絕倫的美術風格，燕瘦環肥各色美人任君選擇，娶妻納妾，生兒育女，必能成為人中龍鳳多種升級方式可以讓你提升門客屬性。

《實時聊天不寂寞，多元玩法好歡樂》
遊戲有全新便捷的聊天室，你可以隨時隨地和其他玩家聊天，互約好友一起闖三國。除此之外，多元的副本活動，各地城池等你收付。怀揣你的三國志，加入我們吧！


《卡牌對決，給你不一樣的體驗》
遊戲採用卡牌回合設置，上陣英雄由你決定，前排承受傷害，後排輸出，各種英雄搭配你來選擇，調整陣容攻破各種城池，更有好禮相送！全景副本，特效招式齊全，暈眩、治療特效到位，卡位打斷切後排，無敵免疫神助攻！

《策略遊戲，增加更多的樂趣》
不只是挂機遊戲的簡化操作，同時加入了策略遊戲的樂趣，只需你的指點江山便可一舉拿下江山，真實一人之下萬人之上,武神趙雲登場、王者之座全新開啟，原味三國、新穎的塔防PK互動玩法，玩家不僅可以通過過關斬將完成統一全國的霸業，還可以聯網與其他玩家分享戰紀、無盡關卡挑戰比拼您的策略技術與實力，登上象徵榮譽的三國英雄榜。無盡中挑戰極限防禦,五虎上將擂台PK,燒腦關卡策略塔防,技能搭配群英策馬,重現三國志三國演義,帝國爭霸重燃戰火。

《玩家好評不斷》
真趙云無雙中國上線以來，精美的畫面、有趣的玩法、無盡中挑戰極限防禦,五虎上將沙場征戰，燒腦關卡策略塔防，技能搭配群英策馬,重現三國志三國演義,帝國爭霸重燃戰火，都受到玩家的無數好評，快來體驗體驗吧！

一款三國正統國戰策略手游，拒絕慢節奏，來玩就送千萬資源。三國武將任性送，呂布趙雲帶你一飛沖天，還有數千三國武將任你差遣。副本模式多樣，還有熱血沸騰的萬人國戰，拒絕枯燥的打怪升級。拉上兄弟一起，擴土封疆，率土之濱，攻城掠地，亂世三國由你改寫。即時戰鬥，完美還原三國戰場！千人軍團，沙場平推群戰三國！萬人同屏，暢爽對決，群雄匯聚勇奪王座！

Facebook粉絲專頁：https://www.facebook.com/zhenzhaoyunwushuang/

summary: 2018大型策略戰爭三國遊戲！集卡牌，策略，回合，挂機為一體的3D真三國手遊。無雙猛將群雄逐鹿，攻城掠地成就傳世霸業。看你敢不敢稱霸全服！

title: Save the Deer
description:
Create the best way for your deer by drawing a safe line and help deer reaching home. An interesting addictive puzzle game with physics lines creation in Save the Deer Game. Deer is running in the jungle and you have to draw a safe line which will be work as a path. Many wild animals will try to attack on your deer.  You need to create a secure way and save the deer. 

One of the most addictive and entertaining physics based animal attack game ever made! Innovative path draw and running gameplay that is funny, entertaining and addictive. Draw deer path is a game where you use your skills drawing the way to help the character overcome obstacles in shape of wild animals and survive, taking it to the end of the stage. Overcome challenges as quickly as possible and avoid all animal attacks by drawing safe path which will way through to the home of deer. Solve the all puzzle levels and make high scores.

Save the Deer Featuring:

• Simple super addictive puzzle game for all ages.
• Create tracks with fingers with smooth controls
• Draw a safest line for your deer in middle of the jungle which will take it to home safely.
• Beware and avoid all wild animals which are ready to attack.
• Draw faster and earn maximum scores to unlock more entertainment.

title: Maid Heroes - Idle Game RPG with Incremental
description:
Looking for another idle game that is easy to learn, enjoyable and a bit of challenge?
Now you can play or not playing Maid Heroes that has both active and offline gameplay.

Notes: This game is still under development. Every feedback is appreciated and really helps in development.

Features :
★ Summon and Collect animal medals to aid your Maid in the battle
★ Choose to play idle or active using a lot Skills to choose from that comes with the medals
★ Prestige / Rebirth system to unlock a whole new level of Guardians Power
★ Endless levels for endless fun! There’s no limit to the amount of power you can obtain!
★ Tons of Achievements to get free diamonds 
★ Unlimited upgrade options
★ Incremental numbers that will keep going up beyond infinity
★ Offline games, play without internet connection

Maid Heroes has everything you would expect from a Clicker or Idle Games
Tapping, Bunch of upgrades, collectables, endless playtime, mountains of Gold and a whole load more.

HOW TO PLAY

Launch Maid Heroes, Upgrade medals and guardians, press all active skills
close the game and do something else
get rewards for how long you have been out
Open new medal loots and repeat the process again

Download one of the most addicting idle games, 
"Maid Heroes - Idle Game RPG with Incremental" today and lead your maid to victory before it’s too late!

WHY MAID HEROES AND NOT OTHER INCREMENTAL GAMES

✔ Very simple and easy to learn
✔ Features and upgrades unlocked over-time
✔ Offline progress, means that the game is actually playing by itself when you are gone
✔ Can and should be played like 5-10 minutes every 3-4 hours 
✔ Lovely programmers pixel art draw
✔ More features to come !!

-----------------------------------------------------
Built with Unity Games Engine

title: Vampire's Fall: Origins
description:
For countless years the villagers of Vamp’Ire have enjoyed a life of peace and happiness. But now, rumors are spreading about a wielder of dark magic - a Witchmaster. Fearing the rumors to be true, the village musters a militia to prepare for the worst. You are a recruit enrolling to defend the village. Little do you know, fate has something special in store for you…

Vampire’s Fall: Origins is a 2D open-world RPG with turn-based combat. Create your character, choose your bloodline and venture out in the world. Will you wreck havoc in the land, or be the hero people are longing for? Will you use your powers to battle other players or to hunt ferocious monsters?

-Open world
-Fully customizable characters
-Turn-based combat
-Immersive stories
-Dialogue choices
-PvP battles
-In-game chat
-Skills and abilities to shape your character
-Choose your bloodline: Nosferatu, Ranjeni, Magistrav or Equides
-Over 150 graphically unique weapons and armor

Vampire’s Fall Origins has been in development for two years as of this writing. We set out to create a serious RPG for mobile phones, without the usual mobile game mechanics. There’s no energy system. There’s no loot boxes. There’s no pay to win. There are, in our opinion, interesting battle mechanics, funny dialogues and a sense of wonder in the world. From our three indie-dev hearts, good luck and have fun!

title: Airplane Mechanic
description:
From the best of the workshop, mechanic, and airplane mechanic game, we have brought you an airplane mechanic workshop which is the blend of auto-mechanic simulator and workshop garage games. 
This airplane mechanic simulator is very advanced and is the latest of 2018. In this gameplay, you experience yourself as an airplane mechanic and you the gameplay takes you through a series of events which give you experience and knowledge of being an airplane mechanic.
In this Airplane Mechanic game, you can work as a mechanic and electrician as you change the body parts of planes, change its tires, fix its internal wiring, fix damaged areas, denting and painting of parts of jet and change its lights in a realistic and equipped workshop. Work on the engine of the plane and upgrade multiple body parts to gain more experience. Face the daily life problems of being a mechanic and discover information about a plane. Become the most successful jet plane mechanic ever and fix the plane.

title: Bridal Salon - Free Game For Girls!
description:
Welcome to Bridal Salon!

You're the best dressing artist out there, and this is your own bridal salon. Your outstanding reputation is leading you to get fame and fortune! 

Everyday you have a new girl that's preparing for her wedding day. So you do the thing you love the most, which is dressing her up to make her gorgeous for a happy wedding day. You choose the best dress, the awesome hairstyle, the beautiful necklace and earrings, the perfect shoes, the elegant veil, and most importantly, the fabulous bouquet, the bridal crown!

They will love their awesome look that you designed. So they'll be happily ready for the wedding. 

Game Features:
- Open up your very own bridal Salon and become a famous Stylist!
- Design and dress up your class A brides.
- Chose the best dress and accessory combination for the bride
- You can change the dress, the necklace, the earrings, the shoes, the veil, the bouquet, and the crown.
- Take a photo to the bride with here groom.
- Share the last result with your friends.
- Save a photo of your design to your phone.

More sweet games are to come. Stay tuned!

title: Niara: Rebellion Of the King Visual Novel RPG Demo
description:
Niara: Rebellion Of the King Visual Novel RPG is set in a world where gunpowder and magic goes hand in hand. The land is vast and is under control of kings. Kingdom of Kruuthvaal is under unrest as one of its port cities have been attacked by one of the mightiest nations in history, Udrela. Peace on the continent was maintained by the Ansark Alliance but it had lost much of its influence due to heavy corruption among kings. Blood of thousands of people is on Udrelean commander's hands who ordered the attack. Kruuthvaal wants his head. The Alliance forbids it. What will happen when a surviving soldier(with a conscience and will to defeat the unbeaten army) finds his countrymen and loved ones being crushed in this political warfare resulting in their blood being spilled?

This game features turn based battles and exploration of the game map using in game choices. There is an inventory, quest and merchant system as well. All effort has been done to make sure that all the necessary RPG elements are included in the game alongside the immersive story telling features of a visual novel.

This is a demo of the game. The full version will be released tentatively by April 2019. Subscribe to our mailing list to get updates about the actual release date. Go to our site to find the subscription link http://niara.redseed.cc

title: Spiritual Battle: Dark Heroes
description:
Jump into the brand new action game based on the mega-hit manga and anime. Build you team choosing your favorite characters and become the best Shinigami in soul society!

100% REPROUDCE ORGINAL WORK
100% reproduce your favorite characters, weapons, skills, musics and scenes from manga.

Exciting Action in Gameplay
Epic graphic and simple joystick/gesture control, provide you a super exciting gameplay. 

RELIEVE THE STORY
Follow the manga story from the moment when you first meet up. Challenge the enemies and complete quests that recreate scenes from the story.

UNIQUE TEAM 
Combine your favorite characters into teams of three. You can make any combinations of characters whatever you want. 

BATTLE OTHER PLAYERS
Join in daily and weekly leagues. Develop your best Shinigami team against other players’ teams all over the world.

title: Animasters: Match 3 PvP & RPG
description:
Join the battle that will spark the legends!
Take a side in the final conflict between insidious arcane mages of Academy and valiant knights of Citadel!
Lead your squad to victory and glory in the new PVP game with elements of Match-3 and Card Collecting Games!
Build the strongest deck, plan, adapt, overcome and win, using a variety of animalistic units each with their traits and abilities!

KEY FEATURES
▶ Crush opponents in real-time battles - match gems to attack or use magic abilities
▶ Variety is the key - over 70 cards of warriors and spells to build the deck from
▶ Fast-paced real-time PVP - duel other players from around the world in dynamic battles
▶ Spoils of war - collect daily rewards and free chests from winning the battles or completing the quests
descriptionHTML:
Join the battle that will spark the legends!
Take a side in the final conflict between insidious arcane mages of Academy and valiant knights of Citadel!
Lead your squad to victory and glory in the new PVP game with elements of Match-3 and Card Collecting Games!
Build the strongest deck, plan, adapt, overcome and win, using a variety of animalistic units each with their traits and abilities!

KEY FEATURES
▶ Crush opponents in real-time battles - match gems to attack or use magic abilities
▶ Variety is the key - over 70 cards of warriors and spells to build the deck from
▶ Fast-paced real-time PVP - duel other players from around the world in dynamic battles
▶ Spoils of war - collect daily rewards and free chests from winning the battles or completing the quests
summary: Lead a squad of heroic animals in this match 3 deck building strategy!

title: Gateway to Apshai X
description:
A long time ago in a aland far far away the kingdow of Mariow was perished in chaos. Hords of monsters and hostile giants overran the army of the king. Several years later the marks of the battles are almost vanished, but there is still one retreat.
Fight through the dungeon and defeat all eight levels. Avoid traps and collect valuable treasures, to be victorious in the end.

title: Arkeos Chronicle RPG fantasy
description:
Arkeos Chronicle is a fantasy RPG / Hack & Slash, in 2D isometric,  and free to play. It's a fun game with great graphics in a nice cartoon style.


- A universe mixing Fantasy and original SF.
- Fun and endearing characters.
- Quality graphics.
- Fights using action and tactics.
- Unlock and use powerful spells.
- Special effects seizing (magic, lights, particles, weather, night cycle / day, fog ..).
- Twenty monsters to discover, all more fun than others (other mobs will be added soon).
- 10 regions, more than 20 maps (other regions will be added soon).
- An original universe, funny descriptions.
- Solo mode game.

The game contains ads (video-rewards) and in-app purchases to get more crystals or kories (game money).

Game developped by a unique person (graphics & code) : Blendman ;)

title: The Raventhal (IBbasic RPG)
description:
The Raventhal (an IceBlink Basic RPG)

Turn-based computer role playing game (RPG) with a wonderfully crafted story. Implements some classic old-school computer RPG style and also includes great 8-bit music created by Pongo.

Story, music and most artwork by Pongo

Features:
- designed for phones and tablets.
- totally FREE with NO ads and NO in-app purchase stuff.
- great RPG story telling conversation system.
- challenging turn based combat.
- encounters do NOT scale to your level...aka old-school
- fixed number of encounters...aka no grinding
- limited resources so use them wisely
- RPG offline and single player (you control all party members) game.
- multiple companions can join your party.
- original 8-bit retro music by Pongo.
- lots of replayability (is that a word?).
- many races, classes, spells, traits to choose from.
- multiple saves available (SAVE OFTEN).
- lots of items to find and wield.
- A short story (2-4 hours) with great pace and no fluff.

The Raventhal (IceBlink RPG) description by Pongo:
"You went fishing, capsized, and wake up cold and wet in the Raventhal, a forest with a very sinister reputation. Your one objective is to get out of the forest and return back to your village. How hard can it be...!?
There's quite a bit of combat, but a big focus on the module is party interaction and story. You start off on your own, but you'll soon find other characters who may join you if you choose. The NPCs are a colourful bunch who talk amongst themselves, disagree with your decisions, and (occasionally) do something useful. Of course, you can always decide just to ignore them all and play solo."

The IceBlink Basic Engine and Toolset are inspired by some of my favorite cRPGs (many being old school retro style RPGs) that allowed us normal people to build adventures using adventure construction sets, unlimited adventure editors, or toolsets.

visit our website and forums for links and more info on the engine and toolset:
http://www.iceblinkengine.com

title: Harry Magic Hogwarts Craft
description:
You are welcomed by the developer One Craft History!

Enjoy the blocky world of in Harry Magic Hogwarts Craft.

Harry Magic Hogwarts Craft  - welcome to the magical world of Hogwarts. Here you will learn how to build with magic, move blocks with the help of special tools. You will have a special task, in which you will have to build the highest tower that you need to play Quidditch with all the girls and boys. Blocks are very easy to move and for this you need only a couple of magic words.

Features:
- Exciting and easy game
- Skins of Harry and many other characters
- This is a mystical and magical place
- Unique crafting system


Both girls and boys will be happy to play this game. You will need to attend lessons, each of which you will learn more about the magical world of blocks and learn new spells that can then be applied to the magical assembly in the new Harry Magic Hogwarts Craft.

title: Idle Legend - Magic Soul
description:
Ingenious work, a combination of adventure, cultivation, alchemy, hang-up and other elements. Then, the best Idle game comes out.

[game features]

===Artifact, Awesome Battle Effect===
Here are mysterious equipment such as the nightmare heart, the war horn, the shattered blade, the lightning ball, the violent shield, the super battle effect, everyone can enjoy this great gaming experience!

===Unique Stamp, Team attribute enhancement===
Thousands of stamps, such as the curse of the Necromancer, the bloodthirsty strike, the sanctuary of the Holy Light, the King of War, and so on, the whole team gains the blessing of attributes, and as your power enhanced, it will be impossible to stop you!

===Wild capture, SS-Calss pets===
Challenge the BOSS and the powerful dragons on the adventure. Capture the cherished pets, and the adventure is no longer alone!

===Six pet professions, multiple formation combination===
There are six majors professions, hundreds of skills combo are freely matched, multiple pet formations, and the battle is changing fast!

===Refine equipment, refining exotic treasures===
The original forging gameplay creates an exclusive artifact. With hundreds of alchemy formulas, you can also become an alchemist who is respected by thousands of players!

Bloody competition, endless fantasy, dragons and dragons, secret adventures... start your heroic journey!

===Super hanging, idle to win===
Offline can also enjoy BOSS drop bonus, 24 hours of uninterrupted income, real idle to win!

===Equipment recycling, you can upgrade VIP without spending money===
Conscience, special recycling system, free upgrade VIP, enjoy VIP exclusive privileges!

title: Brave Frontier: The Last Summoner
description:
BRAVE FRONTIER: THE LAST SUMMONER

Embark on a fantastic adventure in the Brave Frontier universe - a game played by millions - build an army, fight tyranny and reveal the mystery behind a new world of fantasy in this epic turn-based JRPG!

Brave Frontier: The Last Summoner lets your wildest JRPG dreams come true as you get full control over up to 25 characters in a single battle! Feel the freedom of a completely customizable experience as you obtain fantastic weapons, unlock exceptional skills and obliterate enemies with style thanks to an impressive cast of stylish characters! Jump into a brave new world and become the legendary general you were always meant to be!

STATE-OF-THE-ART HD 2D JRPG
Immerse yourself in the rich and vibrant fantasy world of Vask and meet charming characters brimming in style, handcrafted and animated with love to offer you the most thrilling battles ever seen in a mobile RPG!

BUILD AND LEAD AN ARMY
Engage in turn-based battles of epic proportions where up to 50 characters fight each other as you launch synchronized attacks, unleash special Brave skills and summon mighty Spirits to destroy your opponents, no matter their size!

COLLECT HUNDREDS OF CHARACTERS
Assemble a huge cast of charismatic heroes and villains ready to take arms for you as you train, specialize and evolve them to unleash their true potential, completing a vast collection of 7 different species – Humans, Giants, Undines & more!

MILLIONS OF WAYS TO PLAY
Become a master of strategy as you experiment with 9 Weapon Types, from hard-hitting to buff-empowering, enhanced by upgradable specialty skills to obliterate anything in your path – the possibilities really are endless!

PLOT TWISTS AT EVERY CORNER
Put together the puzzle pieces of the last summoner's untold story as you witness history defining events from different points of view, all interwoven into a story of loss, courage and honor! Will you find the truth behind the bifrosts, Summoner?

Embark on your most extraordinary adventure featuring intense battles, high-end graphics, complex customization and content-rich stories! Made for JRPG fans, by JRPG super fans!

_________________________________________

Come say hi on social media:
Facebook: https://www.fb.me/BraveFrontierTheLastSummoner/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BFTLS
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCM3yOUaP3z7ts5MBFGxM-5w

This app is free to download and play. Some virtual items can be purchased for real money.

title: Police Bikes - Criminal Escape Gangster Chase
description:
The threatening gangster chase and wanted criminal have escaped from the city prisoner and are out in the city spreading chaos. As an efficient police bike officer of NYPD and LAPD you have been assigned to catch these secret agent downtown gangsters and escape criminals of underworld mafia heroes and put them back into the city central jail prison. These killer heroes are really dangerous in the traffic chase and have committed offensive crimes. Take up the challenge of endless police attack racing as a motorbike criminal escape gangster chase police rider game.


👮 Your duty is to take out the heavy duty police attack officer and patrol over the area, gangster escape chase criminal and arrest the most wanted criminals with special US police bike squad specialized in crime control of the city traffic. The jail border is guarded by the police bike officer, ride the amazing forces moto trail and heavy police bike chase down the city escape criminal, gangsters and robbers hiding all over the city, use the super nitro speed to chase crooks in cars, trucks and automobiles, enjoy the ride of your life and get hands on the jailbreak hard time prisoners and arrest them on the spot. Catch the gangster mafia syndicate and rouge convicts engaged in crime story scene in vendetta city. Overtake the traffic vehicles & ride your sports police bike on the endless highway roads to complete the chasing missions.


👮 Play your role as an amazing patrol biker in Police Bike squad - Criminal Escape Gangster Chase the latest 3D action packed thriller to fight raging gangster mafia crimes and wipe out the criminal escape from this great city, while chasing on police bike squad, show daredevil police bike stunts on top speed while chasing, rush through the tunnels and bridges and wipe out the criminal and underworld gangster escape mafias. As an efficient highway police bike squad rider, your duty is to police bike chase and put criminals behind bars and don’t let the gangsters prison escape from the central jail. Take out police dogs and hunt down the most wanted criminal and underworld secret agents linked with mafia war crimes. Load all your weapons on your bike, chase and shoot at will at the escape crooks, hit their cars with bullets and stop them at any cost. As a cop in NYPD you have been trained in the US Police academy to face all types of situations, survive the brutal attack and fight for your country. 


👮 Be an extravagant policeman of Miami and eliminate escape criminals from the city streets. Don’t let the criminal escape from your sight, take up the hardcore police chase criminals on your bike and start pursuit chasing. Jump behind the moto police bike loaded with heavy artillery, make sure to outrun the lawbreakers in this Miami police chase, avoid obstacles around city roads and highway like trucks, buses, cars flying, watch out for incoming traffic from both sides of the streets. Police sports bike and criminal escape gangster chase is an extreme police rider game. Ride superfast motocross police bikes and chase the escape prisoners with stolen cars and vehicles.
 

👮 Get a taste of realistic police bike chase of police attack and cop life trained in highly professional US police attack and army training school, avoid emergency and catch most wanted gangster criminal escape thug from the wipeout city, it’s high time to kick your heavy duty moto bike and crack down the terrorists gangsters creating panic and havoc in the crime city of Miami. Drift your racer sports bike with fast speed and drive to catch the escaping prisoners to arrest them. Drive your sports motosport bike to race high speed on the city roads.


Police Bikes - Criminal Escape Gangster Chase Features:
🚨 Police Bike officer criminals mission
🚨 Daredevil stunts
🚨 Gangster mafia car chase missions
🚨 HD city environment 
🚨 Realistic gameplay
🚨 Furious crime chase fight.

title: Battle Souls
description:
A long time ago, a strange moon appeared in the sky, since then the world has begun to collapse slowly, sinking into the sea. When this happened, the gods went north through the mountains, leaving the humans, some of whom began to have dreams of a strange gate in the mountains. But those who decide not to go north, end up going crazy because of the visions.

A group of adventurers decides to enter that realms gate looking for answers.


Characteristics:

◆  DEFEAT enemies in this new tactical RPG for mobile.
◆  SUMMON heroes that will help you in your adventures.
◆  GET objects to upgrade your heroes and defeat all enemies.
◆  PREPARE the best heroes team to fight them.
◆  TRAVEL through the realms to get rewards.
◆  GET items and gold to advance on this adventure.

------------------------

Battle Souls Tactical RPG Turn-Based Strategy.

The game will continue in constant development, new updates coming soon!

Hope you enjoy and don't forget to give us feedback to continue improving! ^_^

Follow us:

● Twitter -  https://twitter.com/TalesoftStudio

● Facebook  -  https://www.facebook.com/TaleSoftStudio/

● Patreon -  https://www.patreon.com/talesoftstudio

------------------------

All content are property of TaleSoft Studio.

title: Tales of Erin
description:
Tales of Erin is original Japanese orthodox story-focused mobile RPG of action, drama, tactics and fantasy, set in a cold war between God and the human world. With a plethora of high quality content – from intense 3D Divinity animations to stunning anime-styled cut scenes as well as superb music and voice acting, players are able to summon over 80 heroes, master the arcane power of Divinity and alter the fate of the world. 

STUNNING & INTENSE BATTLE GRAPHICS
Experience the next evolution of mobile graphics, battles, and storytelling! Fight battles customized for touch screens and on-the-go play with awe-inspiring HD graphics.  

ULTIMATE SKILLS! AWE-INSPIRING 3D ANIMATIONS!
Tales of Erin features an original Divinity battle system, which will change your gaming experience. Aisha, the guardian of Erin, will transform, fall with stunning 3D animations and assist players in fighting as Zealous Blade (Fighter), Green Creator (Healer), Runed Lance (Controller) and Luminous Nightingale (Slayer).

STRATEGIC PARTY FORMATION
Summon 5 types of legendary heroes: Dark, wind, light, fire and water, apply the order of type restriction and release matching skills in perfect timing to defeat powerful enemies and bosses. You'll need to think hard about the advantages and disadvantages of each Hero's skills and weapon. Lead your army with easy touch-and-drag controls.

EPIC STORY TOLD IN ONE MILLION WORDS
Unlock exciting story stages performed by well-known Japanese voice actors! Be transported to the world of Erin by gorgeous 3D animation and awesome music! Clear event story stages and you'll earn Orbs, which are used for summoning Heroes.
New story chapters are added frequently, so don't miss out!

MORE THAN 80 UNIQUE HEROES 
Summon characters by famous illustrator from across the Erin world. Each of heroes has their own background story and unique skills. Develop your Heroes' skills and weapons, and take them to new heights. 

AN ILLUSTRIOUS CAST OF VOICE ACTIORS
Enjoy the magnificent performance brought by A-list Japanese voice actors such as Uchida Maaya, Koshimizu Ami, Tachibana Shinnosuke and Noto Mamiko!

DEEP CHARACTER PROGRESSION
Cultivate your heroes by leveling up their skills and enhancing their weapons to strengthen their performance in battle! There are many ways to strengthen your allies: leveling, skills, weapons and more. Take your characters to greater and greater heights as you battle for victory.

PLAY WITH AND AGAINST FRIENDS
Enjoy real-time multiplayer battles with your friends and guildmates!
Join forces and defeat powerful bosses!

*Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TalesofErin/
*Official Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/talesoferin.game/
*Customer Service: talesoferin_cs@efun.com
descriptionHTML:
Tales of Erin is original Japanese orthodox story-focused mobile RPG of action, drama, tactics and fantasy, set in a cold war between God and the human world. With a plethora of high quality content – from intense 3D Divinity animations to stunning anime-styled cut scenes as well as superb music and voice acting, players are able to summon over 80 heroes, master the arcane power of Divinity and alter the fate of the world.

STUNNING & INTENSE BATTLE GRAPHICS
Experience the next evolution of mobile graphics, battles, and storytelling! Fight battles customized for touch screens and on-the-go play with awe-inspiring HD graphics.  

ULTIMATE SKILLS! AWE-INSPIRING 3D ANIMATIONS!
Tales of Erin features an original Divinity battle system, which will change your gaming experience. Aisha, the guardian of Erin, will transform, fall with stunning 3D animations and assist players in fighting as Zealous Blade (Fighter), Green Creator (Healer), Runed Lance (Controller) and Luminous Nightingale (Slayer).

STRATEGIC PARTY FORMATION
Summon 5 types of legendary heroes: Dark, wind, light, fire and water, apply the order of type restriction and release matching skills in perfect timing to defeat powerful enemies and bosses. You'll need to think hard about the advantages and disadvantages of each Hero's skills and weapon. Lead your army with easy touch-and-drag controls.

EPIC STORY TOLD IN ONE MILLION WORDS
Unlock exciting story stages performed by well-known Japanese voice actors! Be transported to the world of Erin by gorgeous 3D animation and awesome music! Clear event story stages and you'll earn Orbs, which are used for summoning Heroes.
New story chapters are added frequently, so don't miss out!

MORE THAN 80 UNIQUE HEROES
Summon characters by famous illustrator from across the Erin world. Each of heroes has their own background story and unique skills. Develop your Heroes' skills and weapons, and take them to new heights.

AN ILLUSTRIOUS CAST OF VOICE ACTIORS
Enjoy the magnificent performance brought by A-list Japanese voice actors such as Uchida Maaya, Koshimizu Ami, Tachibana Shinnosuke and Noto Mamiko!

DEEP CHARACTER PROGRESSION
Cultivate your heroes by leveling up their skills and enhancing their weapons to strengthen their performance in battle! There are many ways to strengthen your allies: leveling, skills, weapons and more. Take your characters to greater and greater heights as you battle for victory.

PLAY WITH AND AGAINST FRIENDS
Enjoy real-time multiplayer battles with your friends and guildmates!
Join forces and defeat powerful bosses!

*Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TalesofErin/
*Official Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/talesoferin.game/
*Customer Service: talesoferin_cs@efun.com
summary: Get ready for the new ANIME RPG! Call forth the white miracle and explore!

title: Dwarven Village: Dwarf Fortress RPG
description:
Dwarfs fortress  was taken by Orcs! It's time for you dwarf leader! You must destroy the hordes of invaders, that took everything away from the dwarves. Only the anvil, the alchemist's cauldron and the farm were left in the city.
Be a blacksmith, a farmer and an alchemist to prepare everything before the fight.

Help the dwarves gain their land and reconstruct the light of the old, lively village. Hunt for dangerous creatures, collect valuable items from them and use craft skills to create equipment! 

GAME FEATURES:
🗺️ - game mode divided into a village and battleground map.
🧔 - 5 character classes with different skills (warrior, ice magician, fire magician, rogue, paladin)
🌾 - farming (plant the plants on farm and harvest)
🥣 - alchemy (combine elements to potions)
🔨 - blacksmithing (use anvil to craft your epic equipment)
⚔️ - epic fight mode 
⚔️ - unlimited huntings
⚔️ - boss-type enemies with special skills

Don't wait! The dwarves crown must come back to you!

title: Aliens Transport - Police Transporter Truck
description:
Get ready to bust aliens in this fun and adventurous alien game of the year. Aliens attacked the earth and we need to capture them and transfer them to specific facility and alien prison.
Aliens are wandering free on the streets and are a social and natural hazard to society. They are killing humans and causing havoc in the city. They need to be captured and transferred to the mega alien prison. Step into the shoes of a police officer and get ready to wander the streets of city full of aliens. Capture the aliens and transfer them to the facility is your job. See each alien to the prison yourself. Capture and drive the prisoner transport truck to the jail by yourself. Get ready to see some action and capture monsters in the city.
Aliens Transport - Police Transporter Truck Gameplay: Go to the distress areas and red areas of the city to search for aliens. Those sneaky rats can show up from any place. Catch the aliens and lock them up in your prisoner transport truck. Now you have to drive the prisoner transport truck from the city and toward the alien central prison. One by one transfer the captured hostile beings in the prison and lock them up behind bars. Get rid of all aliens in the city. Enjoy transporting and driving prison transporter truck. Enjoy capturing aliens and driving big trucks. Earn the respect of people and complete all levels to capture all dangerous aliens.
Download Aliens Transport - Police Transporter Truck now for free.

title: Cooking Magic Master: Free Restaurant Game
description:
Are you ready to challenge yourself and serve as many customers as your can with super fast time management skill?  Are you crazy enough to become famous world chef?  Are you ready for the kitchen madness?
 If yes, you are at right place, we are sure you will enjoy this excited world best cooking game.  

Cooking Magic Master - is addictive restaurant cooking game - where you have to Cook, Bake, Fry, Grill, Roast and Serve tasty, mouth-watering and delicious food items to adorable hungry customers with addictively fun time management skills.   

Gear up yourself and be a cooking mad, crazy, loveable, nice, unbeatable, super fast, bistro master chef with all the cooking skills and serve these loveable pet visitors who comes to your coffee shop cum restaurant. Its a Juegos de Cocina Gratis! This food truck Cafe has lots of recipes & stories! It's a fun casual game!  

Here you will get a chance to explore exotic cuisines to dine, from entree to dinner, variety of food items, like, hamburger, Baked Lasagna, seafood, crunchy pizza, mouth watering pasta, yummy fries, tasty coffee, all kinds of fastfood,  Chinese and Asian And American cuisines, Noodles, cummins, bollywood masala dishes, pancakes, cocina, mouth watering desserts, bakery products, world best sushi, delicious food loaded with cheese, fish curry, food truck items to international cuisines and what not! Prepare your self for the rush and manage long queues of impatient customers, compete and make sure food doesn’t burn or spoil, keep your self occupied and glue yourself with this frenzy kitchen of yours with different food & customer stories with all the joy which will help you reach at your goal! Keep your customers happy! Help this tiny chef to serve lovely visitors, Bib, Phil, Dina, KoKi, Dania, Nina, Luxo, Abra, Anno, Eli. Be ready to dash across the kitchen and cook every meal with all the love in a record time. This a great cooking excitement with restaurant simulation for everyone,adults but specially for girls who are crazy for cooking, who wants to be cooking princess, cooking champion, world best and famous cooking ruler. Rule with your cooking skills, cooking lovers are gonna love you! 

  Features: 
- The latest and most addicted restaurant management and chef game with funky characters
-  Number of challenging levels with various food items
 - Most addicted time management game with fun cooking game 
 - Tap away to serve - Tap to select food, Tap frying pan to cook, Tap to place food, Tap to serve customers' orders
-  Casual Mode and Time Mode 
- 3 difficulty levels in Casual Mode


Download it now and enjoy all the cooking fun and be a world best famous chef!  Hope you all would like this game!  Please do let us know your suggestions and feedbacks and cooking stories - we will be more than happy to hear them! Your support means a world to us!

description:
Your role is Kinkin a young Ninja Student of the Bermuda Temple who became one of the best apprentice and earned the Title "Shadow of Light". You'll fight dangerous creatures using a combination of punches and kicks and unlock special combo power as you level up. 
Defeated Bosses and gain their help in return. Summon poisonous Frogs, angry Monkeys and many more.
