title: Legends Superstar Ninja Turtles: Action Warriors
description:
Welcome to the new product of Gamestate "Legends Superstar Ninja Turtles: Action Warriors"!
Play as grand action Legends Superstar Ninja Turtles: Action Warriors in the city fighting streets of the USA and with this boxing turtle and sword fighting game skills. Flying fighters are ready to beat with ninja superhero championship show your mutant ninja sword fighting skills and teenage mutant super ninja game to fight criminal and deadly monster hero. Start your sword turtle fighting in the teenage along with this combat arena to protect the civilian of simulation town and eliminate the robber & incredible crime with the edge of your sword blade. In this futuristic city, there are some vehicles are involved like cars and motorcycles, and be a flying ninja moto rider as you race across the grand city. Select your duties and make sure your clear position, So if you see an iron flying mutant & you like, just steal it by defeating the monster criminals. 

Ninja mafia warriors are new and adventurous fighting product so get yourself ready for new grand ninja punch open-world action ninja shadow warrior game where, you are a ninja wrestling hero player who is trained as sword fighter and warrior as a legend fighters and the action warriors to protect people and fight against mafia criminals to end their criminal boundary. Some Superheroes are ready to fly in the air and fight to take their revenge and survive in the world for the Corda ninja shadow warrior turtle fights against the gangster slot to keep his city clean. This is an amazing  Legends Superstar Ninja Turtles: Action Warriors game and you are a superhero who is here to end the vendetta crime, this teenage mutant hardcore ninja shadow turtle is not going to wait for the city rangers/police, Use your supernatural powers and eliminate your enemies.

In this free to play Legends Superstar Ninja Turtles: Action Warriors game, you are going to defend your star city as a legend warrior to bring an end to injustice. If you really want to survive in this world you have to take revenge from your enemies and opponents who don't want to see you in front of them. Fly around the city and buildings as a blazing ninja to find out the hidden places of enemies and have also the superpowers to move from one place to another in the full of terror circumstances. The scary and dangerous enemies are here to have attacked the civilian so move & fly fast and reach on the destination to rescue them. They are highly equipped and armed with the sharp and latest weaponry, they could have the abilities to finish you in just seconds and you have to keep up the skills of flying and fighting with the sword training to defeat them. So, are you ready for the turtles fighting? if no then get ready it's your turn now!

Features of Legends Superstar Ninja Turtles: Action Warriors:

* Sword Fighting game
* Amazing ninja flying skills
* 3d graphics and environment
* Challenging missions
* Addictive gameplay with tremendous tasks
* Easy to play but hard to complete

title: Game Master 5th Edition
description:
Take command of your Dungeons & Dragons game with Game Master 5th Edition. This DM tool makes building a campaign easy and takes a lot of the hassle of out of running a game so that you can focus on more important things.

Combat TrackerRoll initiative, track hit points and conditions, view monster stat blocks, and roll attacks, all in an easy to use interface. No need to flip through the Monster Manual or roll and add up a bunch of dice.You’ll be able to leave your books at home because Game Master has what you’ll need.

Encounter BuilderQuickly put together an encounter, including one with randomly generated enemies. The encounter analyzer calculates the difficulty so that you won’t accidentally TPK the party.

Creature Builder/ScalerEasily create a new creature or modify an one. Specify a few stats, such as challenge rating, ability scores, hit dice, etc… and the app will auto generate the rest of the numbers and text for you.

DM ScreenThe rules reference view lets you quickly look up rules, tables, etc. This view is completely customizable and can even include links to external websites.

Campaign ManagerSplit your campaign into adventures, each with their own sets of characters and encounters. Also keep notes and a treasure items that you can send out to your players.

Dice RollerAll of your stats and attacks can be rolled with a tap of a button. Also included is dice calculator that allows you to input a custom roll. Need to roll 1d20 + 6d9 + Constitution modifier? Game Master has what you need.

CompendiumA customizable compendium of content that by default includes all of the races, classes, backgrounds, feats, equipment, spells, and the monsters from the System Reference Document 5.1. This does not contain all of the official content from the books so you'll have to input any missing. To make adding easier, there is an Import feature through which you can type/copy content on your PC then transfer the file into the compendium. Fan made files are also available for download, so search online.

Fight Club IntegrationPlayers using the Fight Club 5th Edition app (available on Android and iOS) can send their characters to you in the form of an importable file so you can quickly include them in any campaign.

CompatibilityThis app is designed to be played with D&D 5e, but many elements of it can be used for other tabletop RPGs, such as D&D 3.5e and Pathfinder RPG. And of course, because everything can be completely customized, any homebrewed content is also possible.

Premium Version The app is free to download, but you are limited creating a single campaign with one adventure and up to five encounters. Upgrading to the premium version with the in-app purchase will remove these restrictions.
descriptionHTML:
Take command of your Dungeons & Dragons game with Game Master 5th Edition. This DM tool makes building a campaign easy and takes a lot of the hassle of out of running a game so that you can focus on more important things.

Combat Tracker

Roll initiative, track hit points and conditions, view monster stat blocks, and roll attacks, all in an easy to use interface. No need to flip through the Monster Manual or roll and add up a bunch of dice.You’ll be able to leave your books at home because Game Master has what you’ll need.

Encounter Builder

Quickly put together an encounter, including one with randomly generated enemies. The encounter analyzer calculates the difficulty so that you won’t accidentally TPK the party.

Creature Builder/Scaler

Easily create a new creature or modify an one. Specify a few stats, such as challenge rating, ability scores, hit dice, etc… and the app will auto generate the rest of the numbers and text for you.

DM Screen

The rules reference view lets you quickly look up rules, tables, etc. This view is completely customizable and can even include links to external websites.

Campaign Manager

Split your campaign into adventures, each with their own sets of characters and encounters. Also keep notes and a treasure items that you can send out to your players.

Dice Roller

All of your stats and attacks can be rolled with a tap of a button. Also included is dice calculator that allows you to input a custom roll. Need to roll 1d20 + 6d9 + Constitution modifier? Game Master has what you need.

Compendium

A customizable compendium of content that by default includes all of the races, classes, backgrounds, feats, equipment, spells, and the monsters from the System Reference Document 5.1. This does not contain all of the official content from the books so you'll have to input any missing. To make adding easier, there is an Import feature through which you can type/copy content on your PC then transfer the file into the compendium. Fan made files are also available for download, so search online.

Fight Club Integration

Players using the Fight Club 5th Edition app (available on Android and iOS) can send their characters to you in the form of an importable file so you can quickly include them in any campaign.

Compatibility

This app is designed to be played with D&D 5e, but many elements of it can be used for other tabletop RPGs, such as D&D 3.5e and Pathfinder RPG. And of course, because everything can be completely customized, any homebrewed content is also possible.

Premium Version

The app is free to download, but you are limited creating a single campaign with one adventure and up to five encounters. Upgrading to the premium version with the in-app purchase will remove these restrictions.
summary: Combat tracker, encounter and monster builder, campaign manager and much more

title: Choice of Broadsides: HMS Foraker
description:
Command a royal warship and destroy your enemies at sea! As a veteran navy captain in the world of Choice of Broadsides, you’ll fend off (smugglers, slavers, and) foes of the crown to seize your place in history.

"HMS Foraker" is an 85,000 word interactive novel by Paul Wang, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

It’s 1813, and you’re a key sailor in the naval war between Columbia and Albion, where aggression is rewarded and cowardice can get you killed. If you seize enough treasure, you could be set for life – but hesitate against the enemy and you could end up facing the firing squad.

Board enemy ships and force them to surrender, or use your connections to stay out of the fray. Will you steer your crew to glory, or go down in infamous defeat? What mercy will you show your prisoners? Can you control your composure while fighting a war? Revenge yourself on old rivals and reward your allies for their devotion. And whatever you do...

Don’t give up the ship!

• Serve the queen or the king, with an all-male or all-female crew.
• Captain the powerful warship HMS Foraker.
• Train your crew for combat, with kindness or cruelty.
• Parley with smugglers, slavers, and other unsavoury characters for tactical advantage or personal gain.
• Inspire devotion from your crew, or sway your superiors back home.
• Confront storms, accidents, and other maritime disasters.
• Master the balance between bravery and cowardice, cunning and folly.
• Win glory, treasure, promotion, a knighthood, or even a noble title.

title: The Dragon Hunt: Roguelike RPG
description:
The dragons are starting to wake up and you must get into their dungeon to avoid them going outside and  unleash chaos. Equip yourself, learn skills and defeat all enemies that stand in your way.

- Each game has different paths to the boss. Every game is different!
- Both the number of enemies and their type are different in each battle.
- Get items and spells to improve your character.
- Achieve achievements that will allow you to get improvements for your character.
descriptionHTML:
The dragons are starting to wake up and you must get into their dungeon to avoid them going outside and unleash chaos. Equip yourself, learn skills and defeat all enemies that stand in your way.

- Each game has different paths to the boss. Every game is different!
- Both the number of enemies and their type are different in each battle.
- Get items and spells to improve your character.
- Achieve achievements that will allow you to get improvements for your character.
summary: Roguelike RPG with turned-based combat.
recentChanges: Fixed some minor bugs

title: 京華楚昭---橙光
description:
兲芐渏聞，②闆驃騏將軍沬彶弜蒄，楩竝戰糼嘸薮！洏苴骉仩僦婹崶潙①闆汏將軍孒！
兲芐苐②渏聞，汏將軍獍芣跕囡脃，茛迯媔哋岆滟濺貨①點竾芣①樣迡，恏莮亾！
兲芐苐彡渏聞，適汏將軍……獍湜個囡哋……
講哋湜囩國厷炷潙復仇洏囡汾莮裝
朂後潑哯洎己哋敵亾芣湜敵亾，伖軍竾並悱伖軍哋诂倳。
囡炷並悱慲汾囡炷，洧嘸倁被亾悡鼡哋傻皛甛溡剘，竾洧哏戾淉斷哋屰袭溡剘。
泹①苆恏壞嘟湜椘昭哋，唏朢汏傢能嬡仩咜帥氣哋①蔀汾，竾能笣嫆咜蠢兮兮哋①蔀汾。
茬適里，莈洧唍洤哋嫼皛，莈洧沏疧哋恏壞。

官方粉絲頁：https://www.facebook.com/chengguang.com.cn/

title: 東方玉霊宮
description:
------------------------
◆ゲーム概要◆
------------------------
膨大なユニットを集めては愛でたり育てたりしつつ、
最強のパーティーを目指して奔走する
東方Project二次創作ＲＰＧです。


個人制作の拙い内容ではありますが、
少しでも楽しんで頂ければ幸いです。
あと蛇足ですが「ぎょくれいきゅう」と読みます。


------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
◆アプリ内の画像/BGM等の制作者様について◆
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
下記ページにて紹介させて頂いております。
この度は誠にありがとうございました。

もしＢＧＭに興味を持たれましたら、上記ページから
各制作者様のサイトやアレンジCDを確認して
是非本来の作品を視聴してみてください。


---------------------
◆免責事項◆
---------------------
・当アプリは個人制作の無料アプリです。
　サポート対応は製作者の余力次第となりますのでご注意ください。
・androidの性質上、端末やOSによっては一部機能が利用できない場合があります。
・アップデートによりゲームの仕様や難易度等が変更される場合があります。


--------------------------------
◆当アプリについて◆
--------------------------------

　個人的な趣味で制作しております。
　上海アリス幻樂団様及びその他の二次創作作品を製作されている方々とは
　一切関係がありませんのでご注意ください。

title: Lục Mạch Thần Kiếm 3D
description:
★★★ GIỚI THIỆU CHUNG ★★★
Lục Mạch Thần Kiếm là game online nhập vai võ hiệp chuyển thể từ tuyệt tác Thiên Long Bát Bộ của Kim Dung và được phát hành độc quyền bởi VTC Mobile
Lục Mạch Thần Kiếm mở ra 1 thế giới võ hiệp sống động, đồ sộ, với đầy đủ các hoạt động PvP hấp dẫn nhất mà bạn có thể trải nghiệm.
Game tạo ra hệ thống tương tác phong phú đến nỗi các game thủ thường dành ra trung bình 3 tiếng mỗi ngày để giao lưu với những người chơi khác.
Hệ thống thời trang, thú cưỡi, thú nuôi vô cùng đa dạng và thiết kế lộng lẫy bỏ xa các tựa game ăn theo.
Chính vì sở hữu hệ thống thời trang lên đến hàng trăm bộ trang phục khác nhau nên có đến 40% game thủ Lục Mạch Thần Kiếm là nữ giới


★★★ CỐT TRUYỆN ★★★
Người chơi sẽ nhập vai vào nhân vật tham gia vào cuộc tranh giành bảo vật võ lâm, giúp đỡ môn phái Tiêu Dao và các thế lực chính phái giành lại bảo vật “Tiêu Dao Đồ” & bí kíp “Lục Mạch Thần Kiếm”
Trong quá trình tham gia vào cuộc chiến tranh giành bảo vật, nhân vật cũng sẽ gặp được những duyên kỳ ngộ giống Đoàn Dự như gặp tượng đá Thần Tiên Tỷ Tỷ, dập đầu 1000 cái sẽ nhận được bí kíp võ công đặc biệt. Gặp gỡ và đối thoại nhận nhiệm vụ với hàng trăm nhân vật trong Thiên Long Bát Bộ

★★★ ĐẶC SẮC ★★★
- 4 môn phái đặc sắc: 
Đại Lý
Tiêu Dao
Thiên Vương
Thiên Sơn

- Hệ thống khinh công đặc sắc thi triển đến 4 tầng khinh công
- Hệ thống skill đa dạng, combo skill đặc biệt chỉ có ở LMTK không game nào trên thị trường có tính năng này
- Hệ thống Tâm Pháp ngũ hành kết hợp riêng để xây dựng nhân vật khác biệt – không nhân vật nào giống nhau
- Hàng chục loại thú cưỡi : Bạn có thể cưỡi Sói, Panda, lạc đà cho đến các thú cưỡi ngộ nghĩnh như chó Shiba, hạc v…v
- Trải nghiệm những tính năng kinh điển của dòng game nhập vai: Chế tạo trang bị, Sản xuất nguyên liệu, Đánh BOSS thế giới, Luyện Khí, Ghép ngọc…
- Hoạt động hấp dẫn cả tuần chơi mãi không chán
Túc cầu : tham gia những trận túc cầu cực hấp dẫn 5vs5
Bang hội : Uống rượu bang hội, càng đông anh em chiến hữu cùng uống càng nhiều lợi ích
Vận Tiêu : Vận tiêu- Cướp tiêu liên server, cùng gọi bang hội đến bảo vệ tiêu khỏi các thế lực khác
Đấu Trường tỉ võ : Tranh đoạt chức võ lâm minh chủ với võ công siêu quần đánh bại các cao thủ

title: The Amazing Robot Frog
description:
The Amazing Robot Frog is a best adventure type game with a funny robot frog, free of charge and simple, nice graphics. It offers fast control which is easy to learn. You can challenge amazing enemies or explore beautiful city. You can drive vehicles, planes, helicopters with a robot frog. Also there is bosses that you need to beat. Have fun!


Features:
-31 interesting, froggy challenges
-14 types of vehicles that you can drive
-Big and amazing open world city
-Several game modes
-Daily rewards
-Content updates soon!

How to play:
-Simply drag the gamepad on the left to move robot, use buttons for actions.

Tips:
-Move fast to complete levels fast.
-Look for other strategy strategy if robot frog fails.
-Looking for amazing hidden goods is the useful.
-Collect cash from enemies

Latest game of this kind on the market. Give a try!

title: Age of Magic
description:
Join the epic war of the True Mages and fight for the fate of their dying fantasy world. Collect and level-up legendary heroes to take them to fast-paced battles on stunning arenas. Kobolds, Elves, Demons, Angry Raccoon mages, Dragonkins, Ra’Archnes, Swamp Witches – dozens of characters await!
Darkness is descending upon the ruined remnants of the world floating in the void. Each night another light in the sky fades, devoured by the unstoppable demons of the Legion. Yet there is hope. The Dragon Prophecy says that one of the True Mages will enter the Dark Tower and choose the future of the universe. Might it be that you are that foretold chosen one?
=Age of Magic FEATURES=
• STORY CAMPAIGNS. Delve into the world of Age of Magic, traveling with the powers of light and darkness. Meet legendary heroes, fight epic battles with unimaginable enemies. Learn the story of Roland the True Mage and his quest for the Dark Tower. Step into darkness and meet changeling assassin Sharazar, who will stop at nothing to get what he came for.
• PVP. Gather the ultimate party of heroes and challenge other players in the PvP Arena every day. But that’s not all! Take part in the 24-hour Tournament each week - fight your way up to the top, win glory and epic rewards! The most valiant fighter will have it all!
• LEGENDARY HEROES. Collect over 50+ epic heroes, level them up, gear them with powerful weapons and armour, upgrade their abilities and rarity. Try different strategies, create your unique combination of heroes to build the strongest party in the world!
• FAST-PACED BATTLES. Take your party to quick yet tactical turn-based epic battles on breathtaking arenas, where visuals are stunning and your choices do matter!
• AND MANY OTHER MODES. Tomb of Horrors and Valley of Treasures will test your limits as you battle powerful enemies who protect unique rewards, thematic events with mischievous characters who possess special abilities, and a variety of challenges to test your strength!
descriptionHTML:
Join the epic war of the True Mages and fight for the fate of their dying fantasy world. Collect and level-up legendary heroes to take them to fast-paced battles on stunning arenas. Kobolds, Elves, Demons, Angry Raccoon mages, Dragonkins, Ra’Archnes, Swamp Witches – dozens of characters await!
Darkness is descending upon the ruined remnants of the world floating in the void. Each night another light in the sky fades, devoured by the unstoppable demons of the Legion. Yet there is hope. The Dragon Prophecy says that one of the True Mages will enter the Dark Tower and choose the future of the universe. Might it be that you are that foretold chosen one?
=Age of Magic FEATURES=
• STORY CAMPAIGNS. Delve into the world of Age of Magic, traveling with the powers of light and darkness. Meet legendary heroes, fight epic battles with unimaginable enemies. Learn the story of Roland the True Mage and his quest for the Dark Tower. Step into darkness and meet changeling assassin Sharazar, who will stop at nothing to get what he came for.
• PVP. Gather the ultimate party of heroes and challenge other players in the PvP Arena every day. But that’s not all! Take part in the 24-hour Tournament each week - fight your way up to the top, win glory and epic rewards! The most valiant fighter will have it all!
• LEGENDARY HEROES. Collect over 50+ epic heroes, level them up, gear them with powerful weapons and armour, upgrade their abilities and rarity. Try different strategies, create your unique combination of heroes to build the strongest party in the world!
• FAST-PACED BATTLES. Take your party to quick yet tactical turn-based epic battles on breathtaking arenas, where visuals are stunning and your choices do matter!
• AND MANY OTHER MODES. Tomb of Horrors and Valley of Treasures will test your limits as you battle powerful enemies who protect unique rewards, thematic events with mischievous characters who possess special abilities, and a variety of challenges to test your strength!
summary: Epic heroes turn-based RPG

title: The Perfectionist: Demo
description:
Synopsis:
Locked away in a top-secret research facility, Dillan must find a way to escape from the twisted Professor Phillips' experiments. Sneak past guards, battle robots, and endure diabolical hazards in order to survive. Can you escape?

Features:
-10 different endings
-Optional party members, either play the game solo or as a team
-Customizable robot character (upgrade stats and skills)
-Sneak passed guards or trigger random encounters

title: WindScar
description:
2018 super popular 3D Asian knight errant Windscar officially released today, swords master, Mage, and Assassin are the three major careers to choose from, beautifully mysterious 3D graphics, shockingly innovative fighting mechanism, will engage you in this new world.

- Exquisite 3D fantasy scenery, giving you immersive visual experience.
     High-end graphics meets ancient fantasy world, combat effects look gorgeous, make you stay in game mode longer.

- Cute pets, cool mounts, cool online play
     White tiger, Amethyst unicorn, and other mounts are waiting for you to train them. Through a completely new training system, they will become a good helper on your adventures.

- New clan system, marriage system, tenderness and affray.
     Afraid to step into the world alone? Want to have a friend fight by your side? No problem！ Call a brother to fight together. Or if romance is more your style, find a husband or wife, take him/her through many dangerous journeys.

-Three jobs, endless outfits
     The three major professions of Sword master Martial Arts, and Mage are selected with you. Each profession shows a rich feature. A variety of fashions can be chosen for you to show your uniqueness. 

-Cross service wars, hundreds of people on the same screen
     New Server war, hundreds of people on the same screen fighting, cross server to challenge more powerful opponents, the chivalrous people around you will help you, no matter how dangerous ahead, they will unswervingly support you!

title: Z Hunter
description:
《Z Hunter》is a singleplayer and multiplayer turn-based survival RPG game, set during the aftermath of a zombie outbreak, this game brings you the thrills and horror of surviving attempt in an apocalyptic event.
After a mysterious virus obliterated most of the world population and turned billions of victims into mindless infected monstrosities, survivors stayed and worked together for a time. 
But not long after, people started killing each other for food, shelter, power, or maybe only to protect their loved ones. In this hostile post-pandemic world, dead or alive, working together or fight against each other, you have to trust your instinct to survive!
【Form the most formidable squad】
Rescue various survivors and invite them into your sanctuary,
train hundreds of survivors and form the most formidable squad to restore the world!
Challenge other players in the PVP Arena to prove your worth and earn bountiful rewards!
【Develop your base】
Level up your base and unlock various facilities and structures as you progress in the game.
You can eventually enhance weapons, make survival tools, upgrade training grounds, build factions and unlock many other structures to help you improve your base!
【Form the strongest faction】
Team up and form a faction with up to 50 players! 
Play together in different game modes, tackle the biggest world boss and compete your damage for the best rewards. Complete faction instances and earn exclusive items. Fight other factions around the world and make history with your faction members!
【Turn waste into wealth】
Form a scavenger party and collect materials to enhance your weapons, craft gear, and build survival tools.
Join our cause now! Start your own rescue operations and start killing zombies!
Z Hunter Studio
Thank you for your support or valuable feedback. 
We're actually very friendly! Get in touch with us for questions or suggestions about our studio and our game.
Contact us at: zhunter@carolgames.com
Follow our facebook fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/ZHunterUS/
Subscribe to our subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/ZHunter/
Join us at our discord server: https://discord.gg/a8zQDpb

title: Jail Break : Cops Vs Robbers
description:
Jail Break : Cops Vs Robbers is one of the most popular games in Blockman Go. In this city you can play as police or prisoner. when you are a cop: Catch the robbers will receive bounty and merit. Don't kill prisoners or you'll be thrown in the prison. When you are prisoner: Collect Books for Keys or Shovels, you can use them to break out of the jail. Then rob everywhere as you want! 

Want to play more interesting games?Download Blockman Go now!

If you have any feedback and suggestion, please feel free to contact us at indiegames@sandboxol.com

title: Super Awesome Hyper Freakin Zombie Run
description:
There are zombies everywhere. The only way to survive? RUUUUN!

THE ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE IS HERE
Zombies are every where. It's time to run from them. Run as fast as you can from zombies. Jump over cliffs and zombie hordes. Pick up weapons and mechs and annihilate the zombies. Are you going to be able to run from them, or are you going to become one of them?

CAN YOU RUN AWAY FROM THEM?
With easy to learn but hard to master controls, everybody can try their luck getting away from the undead. But who can actually get the furthest away from them. Complete objectives for cash, upgrade your arsenal, and run! There is no mercy in this endless runner that just wants to eat you alive.

WE GOT YOU COVERED:
- Apocalyptic world with awesome graphics quality.
- Simple controls
- Endless hordes of zombies
- Tons of gear to upgrade
- Challenging levels, no one ever said that running from zombies was easy.
- Compete with your friends on Facebook.

title: Warrior Saga: NO.1 Free Pixel MMORPG in 2018
description:
Game Features
※Start Our Adventures Now!
Warriors have been transferred to a new planet, the single way to get home is beating the evil king. With the further adventure, warriors find a huge secret and conspiracy. Join in Warrior Saga now to find out what the secret truly is, help warriors back their home!
　
※100+ Warriors and Combo Skills Can be Collected
More than 100 warriors from four camps – Reality, Animation, Games and Toys are waiting for recruiting. Collect as many of them as you can to build different adventure teams to handle various challenges. Specific warriors combinations can even activate powerful combo skills. Form an epic team to beat devils now!
　
※Largest Pixel War You Never Seem Before
Different from other pixel games with easy battle mode, Warrior Saga supports 50 VS 50 battles. Reject the easy and brainless fight, arrange the suitable warriors, use the strong magic at the correct time. Defeat the most powerful evil with correct strategy!
　
※Build Fantastic Base to Support the Adventure
Warriors can’t go too far without the strong logistic support. Build multifunctional base, promote the skills levels and exploit resource to make the adventure road become easier. The performance of the base can be customized too. Build the coolest base with your own hands!
　
------------------------
Contact Us
Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pixelgame.rpg
Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/WarriorSaga_RPG
Official YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvcQr-r43aVVihnFQl0r6hQ
Email: warriorsaga@herogame.com

title: 십만대적검
description:
☞ 십만대적검 공식 카페 바로가기 ☜

◆게임소개◆
복수를 위해 십만을 대적한 남자 '십만대적검十萬對敵劍'
오로지 복수만을 위해 걸어온 한 남자의 인생이 시작된다!

오채지 무협 소설 '십만대적검十萬對敵劍'
- 2013년 화제의 무협 소설 '십만대적검'
- 원작 특유의 스릴과 파괴력 있는 연출을 경험하라!

시.선.강.탈! 화려한 신무협 MMORPG의 완성
- FULL 3D로 재탄생한 무림의 세계
- 시선을 사로잡는 아름다운 그래픽에 주목하라!

신.검.합.일! 정교함으로 완성되는 액션
- 개성 넘치는 캐릭터들이 선사하는 호쾌한 액션의 향연
- 자유로운 경공과 다채로운 스킬 조합으로 액션의 극의를 완성하라!

개.성.만.점! 방대한 커스터마이징 시스템
- 내 캐릭터를 내 마음대로! 수십여종의 코스튬 보유
- 지금까지 볼 수 없었던 색다른 펫과 탈 것 시스템을 확인하라!

절.대.강.자! 무림의 최강을 가리는 PvP시스템
- 오직 실력 있는 자만이 살아남는 무림의 세계
- 최후의 승자를 가릴 수 있는 결투장, 공성전으로 향하라!
----
개발자 연락처 :
통신판매업 번호: 제2014-서울강남-01064호

title: Mu Origin Pinas - (Version 7.0) Reborn System
description:
A Mu Origin new version , this Role-Playing Game has amazing features to enjoy your experience.
More than 20 new Pets to Ride, get your mount and enjoy
This is the newest version of popular online Game Mu Online

New 7.0 Update
- What is New?
* New Pets to ride and Mount
* New Quests, bosses and Events
* New fashion to look better than anyone!
* New Cross Server Map to fight with thousands.
* New Savior System
* New Revive your equipment.
* Elemental system is improved.
* PvP is perfectly balanced among long range and melee fighters.
* New Achivement Titles
* New War Ranks
* New Reborn System


In This fantastic Adventure game you can choose among 5 Races to become the most powerfull warrior of the Continent.
- Powerfull Warrior uses physical strenght to fight and carry amazing weapons.
- Mighty Archer uses her speed to master the long range Bow.
- The Magician that uses the mind control to cast powerfull spells to put their enemies into their knees.
- Magic Gladiator that combines both strenght and wizardry you can choose which one to master.
- The mystic Summoner that can cast amazing spells to destroy any enemy.

- Ten years legend is rising again
Five classes return, adventure to the classic dungeons!
Dominate the Warrior Land, climb to the top of the miracle world!
- Gergous special effect, readily experience
Realistic feel, game play is easy to pick up !
Jobs exclusive skill, special effect impact the vision of players!
- Million people fights in king hegemony
Same-server group fighting, fiery PK challenge!
Great map, free to explore, enjoy unlimited fun!

Features:
- This great 3D Role Playing game has the most advanced Graphics to date, Amazing game play.
Mu Origin Miracle will blow your mind with their easy game play.

- Visual effects are top of the line, fight and see all skills reproduced perfectly.
Immerse yourself in the Incredible 3D graphics and effects!
Many costumzation for your character, Many Wings, Suits, Footprints, Weapons and mount skins for your Character and your pet this role playing game will get you entertained all day.

- New pet system to collect the most beautiful and powerfull pets to help you fight. You can ride anything from Horses to Dragons, including horses, dragons, tigers and many beasts. You can also equip them with fashion instruments! Incredible fun to do.

- Many Inter Server and Multiplayer events, you can fight with your friends in many ways including 2v2, 8v8 and All vs All.
Mu Origin Pinas will make you spend hours and hours of great fighting experience, you will become master of strategy to put your enemies to their feet. Real time Arena and Legionary crusades will keep you busy and entertained.

- Guild wars events
As territories expand, threats loom larger. Join battles with up to 1000 players to win your guild the highest of honors! In this great free MMORPG you'll need to use strategy and finesse to expand your will and rule over all!

- Romantic Glory
Love and battle make a perfect combination in (Mu Miracle) -Origin . Show your love to the entire world through luxurious weddings and romantic feasts. Take your chosen one down the rows before heading to the battlefield for glory!

- New Class - (Summoner)
Born in the old lands of Elveland, powerfull (Summoner) combine their skills at magic to bring out their inner power. While Gods and Demons fought, (Summoner) stood their ground to bring peace to all creatures!

- Most innovative gameplay!
Grab resources in Resource War while you should take care of assaults from other players;
Hunt down the most fierce BOSS for the richest bounty;
You’ll never be bored in the adventure of Mi Miracle Origin Completely FREE (MMORPG)

Official Website: https://www.muoriginpinas.com

Mu Miracle Origin is a free to play (MMORPG), however, you can also buy some in-game items with real money.


SUPPORT
For questions or support we are here to help!
Please visit us at https://www.facebook.com/MuOriginPinas/

- Visual effects are top of the line, fight and see all skills reproduced perfectly.
Immerse yourself in the Incredible 3D graphics and effects!
Many costumzation for your character, Many Wings, Suits, Footprints, Weapons and mount skins for your Character and your pet this role playing game will get you entertained all day.

- New pet system to collect the most beautiful and powerfull pets to help you fight. You can ride anything from Horses to Dragons, including horses, dragons, tigers and many beasts. You can also equip them with fashion instruments! Incredible fun to do.

- Many Inter Server and Multiplayer events, you can fight with your friends in many ways including 2v2, 8v8 and All vs All.
Mu Origin Pinas will make you spend hours and hours of great fighting experience, you will become master of strategy to put your enemies to their feet. Real time Arena and Legionary crusades will keep you busy and entertained.

- Guild wars events
As territories expand, threats loom larger. Join battles with up to 1000 players to win your guild the highest of honors! In this great free MMORPG you'll need to use strategy and finesse to expand your will and rule over all!

- Romantic Glory
Love and battle make a perfect combination in (Mu Miracle) -Origin . Show your love to the entire world through luxurious weddings and romantic feasts. Take your chosen one down the rows before heading to the battlefield for glory!

- New Class - (Summoner)
Born in the old lands of Elveland, powerfull (Summoner) combine their skills at magic to bring out their inner power. While Gods and Demons fought, (Summoner) stood their ground to bring peace to all creatures!

- Most innovative gameplay!
Grab resources in Resource War while you should take care of assaults from other players;
Hunt down the most fierce BOSS for the richest bounty;
You’ll never be bored in the adventure of Mi Miracle Origin Completely FREE (MMORPG)

Official Website: https://www.muoriginpinas.com

Mu Miracle Origin is a free to play (MMORPG), however, you can also buy some in-game items with real money.


SUPPORT
For questions or support we are here to help!
Please visit us at https://www.facebook.com/MuOriginPinas/

Enjoy the blocky world of in Bikini Bottom Craft - Underwater Tales.

Bikini Bottom Craft - Underwater Tales - is a game about a small, well-known town that is somewhere on the ocean floor, it's Bikini Bottom. In this town you will see many familiar houses, including the house of the SpongeBob himself! You will have to build your own hotel, burger house, and many other interesting buildings. - Unique crafting system

title: Cubemon 3D:MMORPG Monster Game
description:
Cubemon 3D - Massively multiplayer creature-collection adventure game.

Catching & Collect over 400 unique monsters，play monster battle with global players!!

Exploring the six regions of the Cubeland, challenge GYM leaders discovering new species, and making good friends along the way....

Catch new monster on open world, battle other monster trainers on the forest and beaches. & trade with your friends in Cubemon center. Beat all eight GYM Leaders, and become the  legendary monster trainers!

CUBE MONSTER 3D FEATURES

—— 3D MMO RPG GAME —— 

The days of RPG traveling solo are over; in world of cubemon is a massively multiplayer one. Monster trainers from all around the world can join and you will be able to see them around you, living in the RPG adventure with you and fighting to become the legends of trainers league . 
Chill with strangers, make new friends and battle them or trade your goodies; the Cubemon  online world is full of possibilities.

—— SUMMON & CATCHING LEGENDARY MONSTER —— 

Free to Summon & Collect over 400 monsters, New monsters will be add to the game every month!
Capture different monsters to uncover unique skills and boost your strategy in monster battles. Build a world for your monsters to live on monster computer, fill it with habitats and breed new species! Take your monsters on exciting quests, duel and capture legendary monsters . Only then you will be able to prove yourself a Legend Monster Master / Sumoner!

—— PVP MONSTER BATTLE ONLINE  —— 

Join monster trainer league ,Duel other Monster Masters in the PvP Mode. 
-Ranking PVP mode; Fight in the Multiplayer Rank Mode, climb up the leader boards .Each season for trophies, rewards, and a chance to reach the Legendary Leagues and become the Legendary Monster Trainers!
-Co-op battle mode; Trainers will be able to join forces with a friend any time and work together towards your next goal. Catch new monster, complete a Route, or face off against a GYM Leader; all while fighting alongside your friend in dual battles!
—— BREEDING & GRAGON EGG SYSTEM—— 

In Cubemon’s island, we called monster egg ‘Dragon Egg.’
Summoner need to unlock Dragon land on Dragon game system, Putting two compatible cubemon  together on Dragon Land ,they will produce a new Dragon Egg. You also can build multiple Dragon vale or Dragon city on the Dragon land. Breeding is the easiest way to create a Dragon(cubemon) with perfect stats ,since they will inherit some of the stats of their dragon(cubemon) parents.

Cubemon 3D:MMORPG Monster Game is a FREE game for mobile device！FREE to download and FREE to play! Of course you can purchase in-app items with real money. if you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Cubemon trainers can adventure & duel with other monster trainers online. Download today and start adventure over 60 million players around the world.

Check Cuebmon 3D out on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Cubemon3d
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Cubemonster3d
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/cubemonster3d

title: Hero Tycoon
description:
Hero Tycoon is a game that players play the superhero role to compete for resources. Players can choose the hero he likes at the beginning, get the territory and collect the resources to build the hero's exclusive house step by step. 
Here are the rules for this game:
- After the player build a dedicated equipment cabinet, he can get the exclusive skills and equipment of the superhero he played, which will give a big advantage when compete for resources in the wild. 
- The player who completed all the buildings first is the ultimate winner for this competition. Different heroes have different skills and equipment.

Download to play more interesting games.
If you have any reports or suggestions, please feel free to contact us via shaheolGZ@gmail.com

title: It's your story
description:
This is a text-based choose your own adventure app. You are the protagonist, so do what you want ^__^
There will be magic. There will be suspense. There will be fun. 

There is a “back” button, so you do not have to click through everything again, just to see, what would have happened, if you chose another option.

I am currently thinking about opening a subreddit. This way you would be able to influence the story – if you feel like a certain decision should be possible or you have other ideas, you could share it with me and if I like the idea, I will use it. Please tell me, what you think about that.

I am programming this app in my free time and do not make any money with it. There will be no adds. No in app purchase. And since it is “just” a text adventure, I do not need permissions from your device.

EARLY ACCESS!

IMPORTANT: As long as this app is in alpha state or until I specify otherwise I do NOT guarantee that the save files will be compatible with updates. I will change that, when the story gets longer, but right now, I am still experimenting with the save files. 

And now, the most important thing: Have fun😊

title: Saviors of Khondia - Static RPG & Crafting
description:
Rub shoulders with merchants, get rewards by completing jobs, learn professions and manufacture your own objects, weapons and armor. Enter the tavern and make friends (and enemies). Explore the outskirts in search of new and strange creatures.
Will you be the new hero of Khondia?

Features:

★ Manage your own character
★ Dealing and merchants
★ Rewarded jobs
★ Gathering: materials and resources
★ Crafting: items, weapons and armor
★ Find and hunt creatures
★ PVP leagues
★ Buy and sell resources with other players
★ Private mail system

And many other features will be implemented soon...

title: Acidra Tears - Dungeon Action RPG - UNLIMITED
description:
Welcome. Here is a new and changing world of adventure.

Explore the dungeon and get the "Tears" on the bottom floor to take down the final boss.
Set the status and skills to deal with the various and unique enemies and traps of the dungeon. Grow your character the strongest.
Strengthen your equipment and give them additional effects to get even more power.
Explore deep into the dungeon with your co-workers.
Build several buildings in the town to expand the town and prepare your adventure.
Raise the level of the town and defeat the stronger enemies that invade and get special rewards.
Build a defensive building in the world outside the town to prepare for invasion.
Please enjoy various game styles depending on skill and race selection.

“Acidra Tears” is a Real-Time, Roguelike, Hack and Slash, Open World Action RPG.

title: SpaceShip Mechanic NASA: Space Shuttle WorkShop
description:
Welcome to luxury NASA Space Ship, NASA Space Shuttle Mechanic garage. It’s a chance to prove your ultimate experience of Orbital mechanics or space shuttle mechanic as a Real Mechanic simulator. This Game " Real Mechanic Simulator : NASA Spaceship Workshop" is much different from all other Car mechanic simulator, Real Plane Mechanic simulator, Bus mechanic and all others Robot Mechanic Simulation.

In this Real Mechanic Simulator Game you have to chance to become the Real Orbital Mechanic in the NASA Spaceship Workshop. As a Spaceship Mechanic your task is to repair the NASA Different Grand Muscles Vehicles Like NASA Space Shuttle, Space Ship and Missiles. Orbital mechanics or astrodynamics is the application of ballistics and celestial mechanics to the practical problems concerning the motion of rockets and other space Craft. So Get Ready to become NASA space shuttle Mechanic. Its also your duty to launch the NASA Space shuttle and space ship for testing Purpose.

Game play of SpaceShip Mechanic NASA: Space Shuttle WorkShop

The Game play of the Real Mechanic Simulation is Much Different from all other Car mechanic simulator, Real Plane Mechanic simulator, Bus mechanic and all others Robot Mechanic Simulation. In this NASA Spaceship Mechanic Simulator 2018 3D Game you have to chance to become the mechanic, not an ordinary mechanic like car mechanic, Bus mechanic, Bike mechanic, Airplane mechanic or Robot Mechanic. As an Orbital Mechanic you task is to repair the Space ship, space shuttle and Missile. Move Heavy parts of the space ship, Color the Space ship, Repair the lights of spaceship, Change the space shuttle Tyre's as a real mechanic Simulator.

So Welcome to NASA Spaceship Workshop for become a real mechanic in this Real Mechanic Simulator Game and get experience as a orbital Mechanic or NASA Space Ship Mechanic. There are number of workshops and every mechanic workshop performs Different NASA Space Ship and NASA Space Shuttle repairing and mechanic services in simulation game. In this mechanic workshop game, you will not only get experience to repair plane but also will get chance to paint the air plane beautiful texture. 

Feature of SpaceShip Mechanic NASA: Space Shuttle WorkShop

•	Real NASA spaceship workshop Environment.
•	Different Space Ship and Space Shuttle Models For Repair.
•	NASA Space Shuttle Launching Scenario for test Space ship.
•	Chance to become Orbital Mechanic or Space Ship Mechanic.
•	Amazing Real Mechanic Missions.
•	Amazing and Different Game play from Car mechanic, Bus Mechanic ,Robot Mechanic 
        and Bike Mechanic.

In this Space Craft Mechanic Simulator you have chance to polish your Space Vehicle mechanic skills! Get hand on experience in Space Vehicle repairing in  NASA Space Ship workshop. 

You will get experience to repair and decorate airplane, army plane and army helicopter same as an aeronautic engineer in his aeronautic workshop. In this NASA Space Plane Mechanic Workshop, simulation Game you will repair different parts of Space Plane and Space Shuttle. This Real Mechanic Simulator Game is a mechanic simulator Game you have Get Mechanic Experience from many other Vehicle mechanic Games or other simulation Games like luxury car mechanic , car robot mechanic, offroad car mechanic, offroad police truck mechanic, flying car robot mechanic, and other train mechanic simulations Game. But Never Get experience of space ship and space shuttle mechanic .
Space Ship mechanic workshop garage is now open for testing the space ship and  Upgrade the space shuttles! Now you can feel how it is to be a real mechanic Not as a Car mechanic ,bus mechanic, Airplane Mechanic ! This game is addictive! This amazing Space ship mechanics simulator will give you the best opportunity to gain expertise as an Grand mechanic in just one game. Consider it your mechanical engineering training school and learn to fix space ship and work as a NASA worker and Enjoy the Space shuttle Launching.

Now you can feel how it is to be a real mechanic Not as a Car mechanic ,bus mechanic, Airplane Mechanic ! This game is addictive! This amazing Space ship mechanics simulator will give you the best opportunity to gain expertise as an Grand mechanic in just one game. Consider it your mechanical engineering training school and learn to fix space ship and work as a NASA worker and Enjoy the Space shuttle Launching.
summary: Start Work in the NASA Spaceship Workshop as a Real Mechanic in this Simulator.

title: Pocket Story
description:
"Get back to childhood and realize your dream of becoming a pokemon trainer! 
Pocket Story restores the inter-restriction system among 17 original attributes in the battle, real GBA mode PVP system, and wild pokemon capture system. In this game, you will not only have fun in searching, capturing, and training your pokemon, and also earn honor in competition, guild battle and Bug-catching Party. More than 600 pokemon characters in the new version, you also will have a chance to get shiny pokemon.

Amazing advanture! World: unlock new city or town, where you can challenge different opponents in gyms or capture new pokemon; Legendary Storyline: Enjoy movie experience; Hunting Ground: Catch more varied Pokemon from Normal to Legendary Grade; Gashapon Machines: You get any items like Moves, Doll, Sandbag, Evolution stone, even a Pokemon; King Line: Challenge all trainer from the weakest to the strongest on your server.

Ultimate training! Train your Pokemon, upgrade and evolve to make them stronger. Be The Strongest Trainer Ever!

Deep bonds! Join or create a guild, fight together with your member on guild scramble and guild war, share honor and gain Exclusive Reward! Be The strongest Guild from all server!

Do you want some guidance to train pokemon better? Learn more about the game:

Or search “Pocket Story” on facebook

title: #SelfCare
description:
Hello. This is us! We're staying home for the day. We refuse to leave our bed. This is our space. Our shelter. Today, this is the whole universe! 

And it's okay. We're surrounded by our favorite sacred things. Each one has something gentle to offer.

And we'll be okay. Let's practice some #SelfCare together. Let's start with a little breathing exercise...

Breathing slowly connects us to our body and gives us life. Mmmmmm. We can breathe for as long as we'd like. There's no hurry. There's no end. We breathe and we listen to ourselves.

In this universe, our goal is simply to feel better. There's no winning, no failure, no score. No difficulty, no ads, no notifications. There is just us and our feelings.

Join us here, in this room, for a few moments. This room is our escape. <3

title: Finding Bigfoot - Yeti Monster Survival Game
description:
Finding Bigfoot in north forest is not easy. Yeti monster hunter will surely kill you sooner or later. You ave to fight mysterious monster beast. Mist survival would be tough in dangerous forest. You can become food for bear and animals. Be a brave hunter, many people who went on finding Bigfoot just disappeared. Knowing that this adventure might be very dangerous, you prepared for it? 

Bigfoot or Sasquatch is a hairy, upright-walking, ape-like being who reportedly dwells in the wilderness and leaves behind large footprints. Over the years, individuals claim to see the creature across North forests. 

Your adventure will begin from a hunted house surrounded in large north forest with lakes, swamps and caves. You need to equip yourself with spy cameras, traps, hunting rifle, flashlight gun and all necessary items for horror survival. You can always come back to collect emergency health box or more bullets. 

Scary forest will will punish you. In horror survival you have to kill bear & beast. Days and nights may pass and you will hunt and eat animals but you cannot leave this forest. You need to find big foot and hunt monster down.

title: 第六天魔王 - 國際版
description:
2018全新卡牌策略手游重磅出擊，帶您穿越戰國時代，攜手鑄就亂世戰國！
這是一款根據日本戰國時代的歷史改變的手機遊戲，遊戲以日本戰國時代為背景，玩家可以扮演織田家、武田家和上杉家等各路大名，收集自己的名將和其他勢力對抗，最終實現統一日本的目標。

「遊戲亮點」

觀の唯美和風畫面
清新唯美的和風畫面，帶您感受日本傳統歷史！恬靜淡雅之菊，兇狠決絕之刀，菊與刀的衝突之美在遊戲中完美呈現。

技の完美養成體系
完美獨特的養成體系，任您打造個性化的遊戲角色！殺人如麻的第六天魔王，也絕不只有一面。

爽の跨服國戰爆屏
萬人同屏互懟，式神通靈助陣，熱血澎湃的戰鬥畫面，帶來無與倫比的感官震撼！

智の變身逆轉戰局
每位名將都擁有獨特的酷炫大招，上百個武將絕技，數十種兵種特性，組合千變萬化，配合排兵佈陣，讓策略決定戰局。更有爆裝變身系統，帶來一秒逆襲、扭轉戰局的快感。

劇の重塑武士精神
扎實的劇情主線還原戰國時代殺戮歷史，重塑武士道精神。在遊戲之餘，了解與討論遊戲中各種經典戰役、傳奇軼事、兵法劍術也將成為玩家們的互動樂趣。

title: Mermaid Secrets20 –Love Promise for  Princess
description:
The best high school love story ever. Mia has already hidden in the room for many days. She feels so boring and wants to have a free swim. So this lovely couple decides to have a summer vacation to a tropical island. 
Mermaid Mia and Eric come to a beautiful beach and have a leisure chat with each other. Wow, Eric is so charming that he plays a romantic song for his first crush Mia. This high school boy prepares a surprise dinner for his love. It’s so romantic! More love surprise, come and play Mermaid love story game with us!

FEATURES
1.High school boy Eric’s neighbor Susan finds a mermaid in the summer pool.
2.Mermaid Princess Mia leaves high school boy Eric’s house beforehand and escape from the danger successfully.
3.Journalist Ruby plans to explore mermaid secrets but she only finds a fake mermaid doll.
4.High school girl Mia has hidden in the room for few weeks. Princess Mia feels so boring and wants to have a summer swim for fun.
5.Mermaid Princess’s first love Eric promise high school girl Mia to have a summer vacation together.
6.The high school lovers come to a beautiful summer island and start a romantic love date. What a happy love life!
7.Such a beautiful summer sunset! Mia, the flower girl has a leisure chat with her first crush. They are so adorable!
8.There is a love bridge in this summer island. The lovers make a love lock by themselves and fall in love with each other.
9.High school boy Eric date with his first crush princess Mia. Such a romantic love story!
10.Gosh! Why mermaid Princess disappear in the deep ocean? Where is Mia?

Most romantic high school love story. Download mermaid love crush games now!

title: House Designer - Build Home Of Dream
description:
Try the role of a house designer and create interior design for your dream house! Choose every little thing: from posters and pot plants to walls and floor colors! You are free to experiment and combine the different styles of decorations to create your own unique vision and style. You can decorate all the rooms in one style or create a different design for each one – it’s for you to decide! 

🏠 100+ objects 
You can choose from a great variety of objects to decorate the rooms with: sofas, beds, tables, chairs, bathtubs, kitchen sets and many more! 

🏠 9 rooms 
Your house will have 7 rooms and 2 bathrooms! All rooms will unlock as you progress through the game. Make them look stylish using your designer skulls! 

🏠 Create unique house design 
Use your vision and creativity to make the house look classy and stylish! Try to arrange furniture pieces in different places and create your own interior composition! 

🏠 Complete various quests 
You will be given different quests during your playthrough. Complete them to unlock objects faster! 

Modern, contemporary, minimalist, bohemian – all styles of decorations can be used while decorating your dream house! 
Design the interior and make your house look like you intended with numerous decorations! The possibilities are endless – using your imagination and creativity you can create numerous room design plans and put them into practice! 
Your dream house awaits you! Download House Designer - Build Home Of Dream game and start decorating it right now!

title: Bat Hero Prison Escape
description:
Bat Superhero Prison Escape Story is based on a series of unfortunate events that lead the great superheroes bat guy and wonder super girl to the depths of prison. 
Bat Guy and super Girl are two superheroes who capture gangsters that cause trouble in the city and make the police work easy. Keeping the peace in the city Bat Guy and
a super girl is returning from their respective missions by diffusing a bomb when they get the news alert of the shootout going on between police and gangsters in downtown. When they reach downtown the policemen were shot and killed and the gangsters are on the run. Just after Bat Guy reaches the crime scene more policemen arrive and they think the superheroes have gone rogue and they forcefully arrest them. Now Bat-Guy and Girl heroin are in prison when the judge decides to hang them for the killing of policemen. They must escape the prison and bring the real criminals to Justice.
Go on a quest of series with bat guy and wonder super girl and help them both escape the maximum security prison. The guards are always walking and all the guards are armed. There are federal guards and Marshalls outside the prison to guard the prison and cellmates. How will you make your escape?
Complete a series of mission and play two parallel side stories of prison escape of bat guy and prison escape of wonder girl. Collect items that will help you break the prison cause disputes and riots to confuse and distract guards. 
Fight the police and knock them out using combat skills and boxing skills. Play the Bat Superhero Prison Escape Story now and break the ultimate superhero prison as Bat-Guy and Wonder fantastic super girl.

title: Phong Vân VTC
description:
Truyện tranh (1989) - Phim Truyền Hình (2002 & 2005) - Phim Điện Ảnh (1998 % 2009) - Webgame (2014) - Game Mobile (2018)
Phong Vân - Bản trường ca HUNG - TÀN - BI - TRÁNG 30 năm của thế giới võ hiệp đang công phá các bảng xếp hạng game mobile Châu Á đã chính thức có mặt tại Việt Nam với tên gọi Phong Vân VTC.
Nếu bạn là người yêu thích dòng game võ hiệp hoặc là 1 trong 5 triệu game thủ Việt Nam đã từng trải nghiệm Webgame Phong Vân (2014) thì không thể bỏ qua:
-> Một giang hồ đậm chất Phong Vân - bản quyền chính chủ từ tác giả Mã Vinh Thành chất đầy Hung - Tàn - Bi - Tráng
-> Hung hiểm khi truy sát cao thủ: Hùng Bá, Tuyệt Vô Thần, Đoạn Lãng, Phú Quân, Đế Thích Thiên... để tranh đoạt tranh đoạt trang bị cực phẩm.. 
Săn boss Hung Hãn - Nhặt đổ xứng đáng!
-> Tàn khốc cuồng sát trong thập đại chiến trường: Phong Vân Quyết, Chiến Nhạc Sơn, Hoàng Đồ Chiến, Bá Nghiệp Chiến... Cầm đao trảm cao thủ, Nâng kiếm sát anh hùng. Vì bá nghiệp bất luận tình thân.
-> Cảm nghiệm sự Bi thống khi hoá thân vào 4 class Bộ Kinh Vân, Nhiếp Phong, Sở Sở, Đệ Nhị Mộng thông qua sự trải nghiệm hệ thống phụ bản chương hồi bám sát nguyên tác. Giác ngộ triết lý nhân sinh của tuyệt tác 30 năm tuổi.
-> Một bầu không khí Hùng Tráng được tạo nên bởi hàng triệu game thủ Châu Á (Trung Quốc, Hàn Quốc, Đài Loan, HongKong, Macau).... đã lan tới Việt Nam.

Một số điểm hấp dẫn không thể bỏ qua
1. Hệ thống Tay Kỳ Lân uy lực khai thiên quán địa - Độc quyền Phong Vân. 
2. Đồ hoạ đẹp đến từng chi tiết nhỏ, nhân vật tạo hình đầy khí chất, boss cũng có thần thái. Cảnh - Thú - Thần Binh - Ngoại trang... lộng lẫy và hoành tráng 
3. Hệ thống skill tập hợp các bộ võ công chí cao vô thượng, nổi danh trong giang hồ. Combo uy lực - Tung chiêu đẹp mắt 
4. Hệ thống hiệp khách đồng hành, chủ động ra skill – Liều mình trợ chiến. 
5. Tính năng Nhập Ma - Biến Hình, tung chiêu biến ảo khiến đối thủ đứng hình 
6. Bảng xếp hạng nữ thần, ưu ái cho nữ nhi hành hiệp giang hồ với quà tặng hấp dẫn 
7. Hệ thống Tiên Ỷ độc nhất làng game, đến việc toạ thiền cũng cần thần thái 
8 Giao thoa kim cổ, bắt kịp xu hướng thời trang với hệ thống Ngoại Quan liên tục update
9. Nhà phát hành VTC uy tín, lộ trình phát triển rõ ràng, update liên tục 
10. Cộng đồng đoàn kết, thường xuyên offline giao lưu
Phong Vân VTC là game nhập vai võ hiệp chuyển thể từ bộ truyện tranh Phong Vân nổi tiếng. Game đưa người chơi vào một thế giới giang hồ Hung - Tàn - Bi - Tráng. Người chơi có thể chọn hoá thân thành một trong bốn nhân vật là Bộ Kinh Vân, Nhiếp Phong, Sở Sở, Đệ Nhị Mộng. Thông qua các nhiệm vụ và phụ bản dần khám phá một thế giới giang hồ sống động, tham gia và những trận quyết chiến máu lửa để trở thành thần thoại của võ lâm.
Tất cả đang chờ bạn khám phá!
descriptionHTML:
Truyện tranh (1989) - Phim Truyền Hình (2002 & 2005) - Phim Điện Ảnh (1998 % 2009) - Webgame (2014) - Game Mobile (2018)
Phong Vân - Bản trường ca HUNG - TÀN - BI - TRÁNG 30 năm của thế giới võ hiệp đang công phá các bảng xếp hạng game mobile Châu Á đã chính thức có mặt tại Việt Nam với tên gọi Phong Vân VTC.
Nếu bạn là người yêu thích dòng game võ hiệp hoặc là 1 trong 5 triệu game thủ Việt Nam đã từng trải nghiệm Webgame Phong Vân (2014) thì không thể bỏ qua:
-> Một giang hồ đậm chất Phong Vân - bản quyền chính chủ từ tác giả Mã Vinh Thành chất đầy Hung - Tàn - Bi - Tráng
-> Hung hiểm khi truy sát cao thủ: Hùng Bá, Tuyệt Vô Thần, Đoạn Lãng, Phú Quân, Đế Thích Thiên... để tranh đoạt tranh đoạt trang bị cực phẩm..
Săn boss Hung Hãn - Nhặt đổ xứng đáng!
-> Tàn khốc cuồng sát trong thập đại chiến trường: Phong Vân Quyết, Chiến Nhạc Sơn, Hoàng Đồ Chiến, Bá Nghiệp Chiến... Cầm đao trảm cao thủ, Nâng kiếm sát anh hùng. Vì bá nghiệp bất luận tình thân.
-> Cảm nghiệm sự Bi thống khi hoá thân vào 4 class Bộ Kinh Vân, Nhiếp Phong, Sở Sở, Đệ Nhị Mộng thông qua sự trải nghiệm hệ thống phụ bản chương hồi bám sát nguyên tác. Giác ngộ triết lý nhân sinh của tuyệt tác 30 năm tuổi.
-> Một bầu không khí Hùng Tráng được tạo nên bởi hàng triệu game thủ Châu Á (Trung Quốc, Hàn Quốc, Đài Loan, HongKong, Macau).... đã lan tới Việt Nam.

Một số điểm hấp dẫn không thể bỏ qua
1. Hệ thống Tay Kỳ Lân uy lực khai thiên quán địa - Độc quyền Phong Vân.
2. Đồ hoạ đẹp đến từng chi tiết nhỏ, nhân vật tạo hình đầy khí chất, boss cũng có thần thái. Cảnh - Thú - Thần Binh - Ngoại trang... lộng lẫy và hoành tráng
3. Hệ thống skill tập hợp các bộ võ công chí cao vô thượng, nổi danh trong giang hồ. Combo uy lực - Tung chiêu đẹp mắt
4. Hệ thống hiệp khách đồng hành, chủ động ra skill – Liều mình trợ chiến.
5. Tính năng Nhập Ma - Biến Hình, tung chiêu biến ảo khiến đối thủ đứng hình
6. Bảng xếp hạng nữ thần, ưu ái cho nữ nhi hành hiệp giang hồ với quà tặng hấp dẫn
7. Hệ thống Tiên Ỷ độc nhất làng game, đến việc toạ thiền cũng cần thần thái
8 Giao thoa kim cổ, bắt kịp xu hướng thời trang với hệ thống Ngoại Quan liên tục update

title: DinoKnights
description:
Saddle up to defend the realm on dino-back! 

Once a humble farmer’s child, you’ve been accepted into Queen Isobel's Rangers: brave knights who patrol the kingdom of Pascalia on scaly beasts. But just as you receive your own dino and begin your career as a knight-ranger, you discover evil forces are converging to destroy the Queen, and Pascalia itself. 

"DinoKnights" is a 177,000-word interactive fantasy novel by K.T. Bryski, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

Enemies and terrifying foes surround you: but whom should you fear most? The Dread Wizard Sargossa, raising an army of un-dead dragons, or an enemy much closer to the court—the Queen's own sister, Ermessen? And what about your burgeoning talent for magic? Will you hone your powers to save your village and fight Sargossa? With a dinosaur at your side and sword in hand—the realm’s fate rests on you!

• Play as male, female, or non-binary; gay, straight, or ace.
• Choose one of six different dinosaurs as your steed, including allosaurus, triceratops, and velociraptor!
• Foil a palace coup—or join it, instead!
• Hit the training yard with your dino, or spend your time cozying up to nobles and mages.
• Find love with the royal heir, a charming bard, or a powerful mage!
• Discover your secret, magical heritage.
• Fight to save your own home village from destruction.
• Defend the poorest peasants, or win fame in Royal Tournaments.

Evil is waking, and Pascalia needs you. Will you and your dinosaur answer the call?

title: Rainbow Fashion Games - Girls Dress up
description:
Our collection with fashion games is bigger today with one of the most complete dress up games for girls called Rainbow Fashion Games - Girls Dress up where you can test your fashion skills and change the look of this cute girl for these last summer days.

First step in this genre of fashion games is in our makeup salon where you can combine tons of colors for eyeshadows or for lipstick. match them and don't forget to add a pattern. At the end of this level of our girls makeup games you will see the results : a perfect and colorful makeup.

The second step in this genre of fashion games is about hairstyle. Choose which kind of hair you want, long or short, red or brown and use the paint to change the color as you like. Or maybe you want to combine more colors and make a true rainbow hairstyle. Once you will finish with this level, you're ready to pass to the next step of our dress up games for girls: the fashion part.

In the last level of these fashion games you have tons of clothes : beautiful dresses, elegant shoes and purses, shining necklaces and bracelets. Will be hard to choose a single dress. And this is not all ! There are more clothes and accessories, all you need to do is to click the buttons again ! This last step from our girls dress up games is about imagination, so prove that you are a true fashionista and combine the clothes with matching shoes and purse !

Rainbow Fashion Games - Girls Dress up features :

- a big makeup salon with tons of colors for lipstick and eyeshadows like in all girls makeup games
- beautiful hairstyles which you can paint in our virtual hair salon
- a true fashion studio, like you see in all dress up games for girls

- easy to play for all those girls that wants to play girls dress up games

title: MU Origin-PH Titan 7.0 Online (Free Diamonds)
description:
MU Origin-PH Titan 7.0 Online

Bring back the old times online gaming memories with the New version of popular PC-Game in mobile devices, Enjoy playing with friends or make new friends while evolving your character equip with huge selection of Fashion for Set, Weapons, Mounts, Wings, Soul and Footprints and a lot more features than ever.

Fantastic Adventure game you can choose among 5 Races to become the most powerfull warrior of the Continent.
- Powerfull Warrior uses physical strenght to fight and carry amazing weapons.
- Mighty Archer uses her speed to master the long range Bow.
- The Magician that uses the mind control to cast powerfull spells to put their enemies into their knees.
- Magic Gladiator that combines both strenght and wizardry you can choose which one to master.
- The Mystic Summoner that can cast amazing spells to destroy any enemy.

- Ten years legend is rising again
Five classes return, adventure to the classic dungeons!
Dominate the Warrior Land, climb to the top of the miracle world!
- Gergous special effect, readily experience
Realistic feel, game play is easy to pick up !
Jobs exclusive skill, special effect impact the vision of players!
- Million people fights in king hegemony
Same-server group fighting, fiery PK challenge!
Great map, free to explore, enjoy unlimited fun!

Features:
- This great 3D Role Playing game has the most advanced Graphics to date, Amazing game play.
Mu Origin-PH will blow your mind with their easy game play.

- Visual effects are top of the line, fight and see all skills reproduced perfectly.
Immerse yourself in the Incredible 3D graphics and effects! 
Many costumzation for your character, Many Wings, Suits, Footprints, Weapons and mount skins for your Character and your pet this role playing game will get you entertained all day.

- New pet system to collect the most beautiful and powerfull pets to help you fight. You can ride anything from Horses to Dragons, including horses, dragons, tigers and many beasts. You can also equip them with fashion instruments! Incredible fun to do.

- Many Inter Server and Multiplayer events, you can fight with your friends in many ways including 2v2, 8v8 and All vs All. Will make you spend hours and hours of great fighting experience, you will become master of strategy to put your enemies to their feet. Real time Arena and Legionary crusades will keep you busy and entertained.

- Alliance War events
As territories expand, threats loom larger. Join battles with up to 1000 players to win your guild the highest of honors! In this great free MMORPG you'll need to use strategy and finesse to expand your will and rule over all!

- Romantic Glory
Love and battle make a perfect combination in (Mu Origin). 
Show your love to the entire world through luxurious weddings and romantic feasts. Take your chosen one down the rows before heading to the battlefield for glory!

- New Class - (Summoner)
Born in the old lands of Elveland, powerfull (Summoner) combine their skills at magic to bring out their inner power. While Gods and Demons fought, (Summoner) stood their ground to bring peace to all creatures!

- Most innovative gameplay!
Grab resources in Resource War while you should take care of assaults from other players; 
Hunt down the most fierce BOSS for the richest bounty; 
You’ll never be bored in the adventure Completely FREE (MMORPG)

Mu Origin-PH Titan is a Free To Play (MMORPG) but you can purchase Diamonds in-game to support us.

SUPPORT
For questions or support please send us a message! 
Facebook Page at https://www.facebook.com/MUOriginPhilippines/
Facebook Group at https://www.facebook.com/groups/mutitanforum/

title: Bus Rush 3D: Subway Surf 2018
description:
Bus Rush 3D: Subway Surf 2018is a subway themed endless run game.
Super Subway 2018: Bus Hours 3D is a subway themed endless run game.

Slide the screen to surf in subway, escape from inspectors.
-----------------------
Super crazy running game, subway Surf, surfers run as fast as you can! Bus Rush 3D: Subway Surf 2018 is an amazing running game on subway for runner. Run along the chaos complex traffic subway and escape from the monster.
-----------------------
Swipe to turn, jump and slide to avoid hitting obstacles, barrier and subway trains. Have exciting run surfers on Bus 3D, collect coins and buy power up. Unlock new characters, and see how far you can run! Underground city adventure travel along the subway tracks start now, Subway surf with your friends. Run like hell and challenge your limit. Bus Rush 3D: Subway Surf 2018 must be a very fun run game. Download it now and start your Subway Surf run and forest surfers, join the most thrilling dash.
-----------------------
Bus Rush 3D: Subway Surf 2018 Features:
- New subway scene, wonderful underground city and forest.
- Thrilling moment, death speed
- A variety of role selection, a variety of unique skills
- Easy and smooth operation

Those are some of the advantages of this latest subway rush. Then the next I will discuss in-game items.
- Rocket, handy for you to fly and collect as many gold coins without a hitch.
- Shoes jump, useful to run faster and jump over many trains that block you.
- Adhesives Coins, useful to collect as many coins quickly.
- Gold Star, useful to double gold coins that you get from the rush surfers
- Skateboard, surfing belt of railroad tracks safely and quickly.

How to play Bus Rush 3D: Subway Surf 2018:

title: Pika Go
description:
Pika Go is a turn-based strategy RPG which accurately reproduces everything in the original Pokemon manga series. In this fantastic world, you can capture, upgrade and evolve all kinds of adorable Pokemon. And Pokemon can acquire new more gorgeous appearance and more powerful skills when they evolve to a certain level!

Log in every day to claim free diamonds. Get FREE VIP 1 once you start the game and there are still more benefits for you to claim!

Lots of Pokemon are waiting for you to be your partners. Get free Summon Scrolls every day, and try your best to find out the secret of different Pokemonbond effect. Moreover, you don't need to stay whole day in game to upgrade because online reward is all you need in a day. 

Hey, come on! Pick up your Pokemon now and challenge the famous Gyms to become the Champion! Pikapikachu!

title: Match Hero: Legendary Puzzle RPG
description:
Match 3 puzzle, simulation and RPG genre combined into Match HERO: Legendary puzzle RPG! 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Match HREO: Legendary puzzle RPG has many features you will fall in love with! 
Collect legendary hunters, defeat evil monsters and manage stores in the castle!

~ There was a peaceful kingdom with many citizen and buildings. But one day, all of a sudden, monsters come out from a mysterious gate and the kingdom is isolated from land. It's going on the wane! Now, you're a master of hunters and only hope of this village. Craft powerful hunter team and beat of all monsters and Let's put this empire back the way it was! ~

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

#1 Match and Switch, Easy and fun! 
Forget about difficult puzzle games before! Enjoy new puzzle play with amazing combos and effects!
Tap the block you want to switch and click another block for change! 
No limit and obstacles! tap, switch, swap, drag, whatever you can do!

#2 Strategic battle play!
A various hero of different tribe and class leads you way of victory! Grow hunters by using badges from the empire's citizen. 
Don't forget to use hunter's skill timely and catch weak point of enemies as following attribute relationship. 
Unexpect combos and special blocks make a battle more thrilling!

#3 Build, upgrade, manage the store and castle!
Each monster drops item and treasure which can be used for store operation! Manage many store of empire and make it revive!
Upgrade all stores and manage it efficiently for enomoruos coin and jewels!

* In app Purchase
- Match HERO: legendary puzzle RPG is free to play
- Optionally, Items are available for purchase in this game.

* Permission notice
- Access permission are requsted in order for us to provide you with game process and ad in game.

title: My Barber Shop - Hair Beauty Salon Simulation Game
description:
Hey guys!! Do you want to open up your own barber shop? Then we have brought the best salon game for you. In this barber shop, you need to maintain your own barber shop by managing lots of customers. That's not it, you need to serve the best service to the customer before they become angry and leave. There will be the time limit for you to serve a number of customers and achieve goals. This game is packed with a perfect bunch of tasks to maintain a barber shop with lots of fun. So what are you waiting for? Install and play this addictive virtual barber shop game.

Key Features:

Maintain and upgrade your own barber shop
Perform so many different salon treatments to serve the customers
Upgrade your shop to get more customers and coins
Daily rewards and daily challenges will be there to surprise you
Different power-ups to boost up your gameplay
Numerous tools to operate and serve the customers

title: Pirate of the Seven Seas Craft - Ocean Battle
description:
You are welcomed by the developer One Craft History!

Enjoy the blocky world of Pirate of the Seven Seas Craft - Ocean Battle.

Pirate of the Seven Seas Craft - Ocean Battle - welcome to the islands of angry pirates! Your main task is to build the biggest, beautiful and combat pirate ship and go a Caribbean Sea. Build a deck, make sails, set up battle cannons, and dial the brave team of pirates. You will have to fight for the territory of the islands with other pirates. Now your duty is to find the treasure that is on the mysterious island, with the help of a map and a compass you and the team will go to the dense jungle in search of old gold.

Features:
- Exciting and easy game
- Real pirate battles
- More Treasures
- A long pirate journey
- Unique building blocks

And also you are awaited by pirats adventures, mysterious love, treasure hunt. Conquer boundless new territories sea and oceans and expand your building art throughout the world with the help of Pirate of the Seven Seas Craft - Ocean Battle.

At the edge of Stonia continent, there lives a legendary dragon in the Kelpy Mountain. Luna goes on an adventure to hunt down the dragon. Learn various skills, summon new mercenaries, craft legendary weapons, explore mysterious world and defeat unique monsters. Enjoy the game with Knightess Luna.

You can also befriend with monsters Luna met during the adventure, and fight with them.

title: Dungeon Adventure: Epic Edition ( Roguelike RPG )
description:
Dungeon Adventure is a roguelike turn-based RPG. Epic Edition its an improved version of original Dungeon Adventure game that was released in 2014.

Descend to darkest dungeons, fight with monsters, avoid deadly traps and collect treasures!

Heroes
Select one of available heroes, each with unique abilities and stats. Also each hero level you will able to select talent, talents can increase stats of your hero or grant unique and powerful abilities.

Dungeons
Explore randomly generated dungeons full of monsters, traps and treasures. Reach 100 dungeon level and defeat Dungeon Overlord!

Monsters
Fight with various monsters and bosses. Some of them have unique abilities that can kill your hero very fast so be careful!

Permadeath
If your hero die, you must start a new game. Each time hero die you will receive soul stones. You can spend soul stones to make your heroes stronger.

Items
Collect various randomly generated items or craft your own.

Artifacts
Artifacts it's a rare items that can be found in dungeons.( From bosses and special chests ). Each artifact will grant unique ability to your hero. Also you can upgrade your artifacts and become stronger.

What's new in Epic Edition?
• Game transferred to new engine( Corona SDK ) and code was fully rewritten.
• New UI
• New monsters and heroes
• Artifact system
• Added inventory
• Added new item types
• Stats and abilities was reworked
• Added abilities to monsters
• And many others small upgrades and fixes

Thanks for playing Dungeon Adventure game!

title: Shadows In Salem: A Text-Based Choices RPG
description:
Shadows In Salem is a completely text-based, choice-driven game that adapts to your choices. Left alone to your imagination, experience the arduous adventure of an accused witch during the Salem Trials. Can you come to terms with the truth of an inescapable reality? Traverse through this interactive story of a young woman thrown into the midst of a world against her. Can you beat the odds?

BE A PART OF THE STORY
Experience the weight of every decision, whether it be casting spells or preparing for your trial. Live in the outcome of every choice in the struggle for survival. YOU have the power to choose your path in this interactive story. 

BLAST FROM THE PAST
Shadows in Salem is reminiscent of the old style Choose Your Own Adventure books (CYOA). In the age of modern technology, we strive to realize the core of what matters most- storytelling. As a completely text-based game, you are left alone to visualize the adventure, and YOU are the main character.

FOR EVERYONE
This simple RPG is perfect for anyone, whether it be someone looking for a neat spin on a choices game, or a good quality, brain-stimulating read. Incredibly simple, yet sleek, Shadows In Salem has absolutely no learning curve, simply tap your choices.

TEXT-BASED
Take a break from the CGI and enjoy the simplicity of text. Not only flex your brain muscles, but have fun doing it, navigating your way through an interactive story. We’ve modernized the CYOA, experience the role playing without the hassle. 
Discover completely new paths by replaying with different choices. Encounter new characters and decisions. Where will the story take you?

title: Love & Diaries: Ash - Romance Novel
description: « The heroine, a journalist trying to make her name, decides to tackle a particular subject: the illegal car races that have been on the increase for some time in the western United States. To do this, she will try to enter the environment and write a file that will ensure a good career. But she will quickly realize the dangers that lie ahead, and what really lies behind these races. As the adventure, she will also meet people, who will change for the worse and for the better. She crosses the road of Ash. Intriguing and mysterious, he first tries to keep her away from him, then ends up succumbing to it. Ash, however, faces a dilemma: continue her easy life, with a lot of money, or leave this environment to find a simpler existence and live alongside the heroine. »

title: Seal of Codex
description:
GAME FEATURES:

Legendary Heroes
Fantastic characters you've never seen before! Join us and explore a variety of epic stories！Summon heroes, train them and collect outfit to upgrade their abilities, all heroes have their unique combat skills and attack styles, which leads to totally different gaming experience with different heroes. Build your best team to battle the forces of darkness together!!

Innovative Gameplay
Move your finger and link jewels as many as possible. The longer the connection, the more powerful the attack! Make good use of FEVER TIME!! Keep deleting runes to launch heroes' specific skills, and the massive attack satisfies players' sense of achievement.

Guild Wars
Join a guild, fight alongside your friends online, and defeat evil guild boss. You can also upgrade guild technology, challenge guild dungeon and increase guild level to acquire plenty of rewards!! Besides, the interesting emoji and chatting system make much more fun while playing.

Worldwide Arena
Put forth your best heroes to do battle in the ARENA. Compete with players from different countries, enjoy real-time combat, defeat others, and climb up the leader board for the rich rewards!
