title: Legacy of Legends - Idle RPG
description:
In this IDLE RPG you will lead 🧙‍ Merlin and King Arthur 🤴 to their destiny of LEGENDS!
Gather the ⚔️ HEROES 🏹 in the kingdom and embark on a nonstop TAP adventure.

⭐️ Welcome to a next-gen CLICKER game that is not all about tapping! ⭐️
You can still leisurely tap and comfortably IDLE while your party grows stronger over time, but executing a proper STRATEGY in choosing, upgrading and customizing your HEROES is the only way to defeat the treacherous knight Mordred and reach the realm of LEGENDS!

GAME FEATURES:

⭐️ Idle & Tap Systems ⭐️
TAP your way through any challenge and BATTLE even when you’re away.
GATHER treasures and artifacts and EXPERIENCE the Arthurian LEGENDS.

⭐️ Deep Strategy ⭐️
CHOOSE your heroes. UPGRADE their abilities. EVOLVE them visually.
COLLECT epic gear. REROLL legendary runes. CAST arcane spells.

⭐️ Vast Universe ⭐️
JOURNEY the rich Arthurian world and SURVIVE its dangerous wonders.
DEFEAT countless enemies and CHALLENGE yourself in Eclipse.

⭐️ PvP Challenges ⭐️

COMPETE with millions of players to DOMINATE the rankings.

The Grand Wars: San Andreas is the best simulator of wars in San Andreas city

It is a unique game with realistic physics and perfect 3D graphics with a real-time control system

New:

- Grand Endless space for police actions: hit and run, auto stealing, police firefight and even more

- Third person gameplay: car stealing, man shooting and driving are all for you, with the most powerful 3D engine

Grand rope hero Vegas Mafia Crime Fight To Survive

description:
Subway Surf: Bus Rush 2019 is a subway themed endless run game.

Slide the screen to surf in subway, escape from inspectors.
-----------------------
Super crazy running game, subway Surf, surfers run as fast as you can! Subway Surf: Bus Rush 2019 is an amazing running game on subway for runner. Run along the chaos complex traffic subway and escape from the monster.
-----------------------
Swipe to turn, jump and slide to avoid hitting obstacles, barrier and subway trains. Have exciting run surfers on Bus 3D, collect coins and buy power up. Unlock new characters, and see how far you can run! Underground city adventure travel along the subway tracks start now,surf with your friends. Run like hell and challenge your limit. Subway Surf: Bus Rush 2019 must be a very fun run game. Download it now and start your Subway Surf run and forest surfers, join the most thrilling dash.

- A variety of role selection, a variety of unique skills
- Easy and smooth operation

- When you are pursued by a security guard / ranger, you must run and stay away from the security guard, when you run, you will find many challenges that can make you fail to succeed in playing the 2017 subway surf game.

Play the best wild west survival hunter cowboy games with horse buggy and horse cart transporter simulation.
A gunfighter cowboy and wild west hunter was invited by the Sheriff of the town to clean up the westland from the bandits and robbers. The bounty hunter western cowboy falls in love with the sheriff’s daughter Sarah gray and decides to build new west town to live with her new wed. The infamous cowboy gunfighter has a horse some gold, a horse carriage buggy, and a gold treasure box he received as a reward from sheriff of old west town. Now he wants some rest from the rampage of guns, revolvers, gunfights and shootouts in a western island near the old west town. He has already killed all the west mafia and wildland outlaws. This is best wilderness survival training game with horse buggy racing, and horse cart transport to build and craft a new westland town for survival and enjoy the life with sheriff daughter Sarah who was her girlfriend.
Construct Your Own West Town
Play the free to play open world western wilderness survival games, ride on the horse, go for two guns shooting and gun hunting the deer and stag for food. Drive your horse cart to the Red Brick store, Stone crusher market, Buy Cement, sandboxes, wood logs and wooden planks from the jungle area woodcutter stores and build your own wild dead town in mafia redemption gunfighter and hunter survival games. This one the best western cowboy game offers a lot of fun of buggy racing simulation, town construction and city management to build your living house, hospitals, cowboy office, cattle sheds and guest houses. 
Horse Cart Simulation- Western Buggy Ride
This horse race simulation and wildland survival game encloses western horse cart transport simulator and bounty hunting training. There are time bound tasks you will need to perform; buy materials from different wildland malls and western markets. Once you have bought and transported all the materials for specific building you will get construction started and within no days a building will be found erected for you. 
Missions:
Build the First House of the town where you will settle with the daughter of west town Sheriff. Use horse cart to Transport building Material. You will be guided by the map to reach to the different Markets to complete the purchase of required materials for constructing and crafting the Modern West Town for you and your girlfriend. After the completion of all the important buildings and structure of the town, you will then go to American Frontier western town and meet the Sheriff for her daughter to get her married bring her in new Settler Town. 
Cowboy Mr. Westland History
Mr west from north American cowboy town is an infamous west warrior, he is amazing gunfighter, gun slinging master, a gold hunter by hobby. He comes to wild west mafia town for deliverance and redemption and becomes the savior of the red dead west city town. He fights with bloody western mafia, kills the bandits and Gold robbers, shoots the bounty hunters. He survives in the dust of deserts earns bounty and gold, hunts for diamonds in the western desert. He meets with African American cowboys, encounters the pirates of coastlines in this best gun shooter mafia games.
Culture of the Game
This is sandbox styled free to play game with open world of west to explore, hunt and survive. Be the master driver of western village horse carriage transporter in the westland world. Dig for gold and hunt for food with your cowboy guns fighter as a survivor vaquero of wild wild west in this best western game of westerland survival training. Once you complete constructing the western island town; you will have plenty of time for bounty hunting, gold digging, gun fighting with indian cowboys and vaqueros, riding you Arabian horse and enjoy with your girlfriend and wife on horse chariot while travelling to farwest in this western cowboy gunfighter and gunslinger games.

title: Naughty Neighbor - Scary House
description:
There arrives a new person in your neighborhood came from any other country. He is a little creepy neighbor, he is always busy in suspicious activities. He designed his home like the scary house in movies, that's why all children call him the scary neighbor. But you have to act as a naughty neighbor to disturb his suspicious and scary activities.

You have to sneak into your scary neighbor house for monitoring all the suspicious activities and for enjoying the ghost adventures. Accept different challenges for teasing your crazy neighbor. Keep eyes on him like when he left the house, when he returned from his job, what he brought with him etc. You have to save yourself while doing all mystery work. If he sees you near his house then he may attack you. So self-defense must be your first priority. If you are caught by your scary neighbor then you are dead and you cannot continue your challenging missions. 

It also came to the knowledge that your horror neighbor might be involved in criminal activities like murder, kidnapping or may be a member of the grand mafia. You may be taught him lesson in different ways like stealing his axe, bag, prank etc. or locking the door from outside or by throwing the different items in his house. But always beware of his presence, if you are caught then you are done and will not able to anything further.

This crazy neighbor game is the very exciting sneaky game which will engage you for hours and you would play it nonstop making your spare time into quality time. Your main target is to tease your crazy neighbor in different ways, this neighbor hell game seems to be very easy but in actual its very tough to play because you to do multitasking in this spooky neighbour game. You have to act like a secret agent for spying on your scary neighbor activities. Follow his each and every movement for teasing him in the best way so that he stop his suspicious activities. 

There are the variety of tasks for entertaining your, first you need to get into the house of your scary neighbour secretly to accomplish your first challenging mission. You have to be very careful, if you are spotted by your strange neighbour then you would be done and will not be able to complete your task. So be careful on each step and keep on sneaking for avoiding any attack. You should always have the escape plan for your safety, if you are caught red-handed then you must manage to escape for saving your life otherwise you would have to restart your game for completing the remaining missions. 

There are a variety of missions for teasing your new neighbor so that he can not continue his suspicious activities. Get inside his house and start monitoring him, unlock all the rooms for your escape. If he is planning to assassinate anyone, then steal his the axe. Just sneak and monitor to avoid any uncomfortable situation for you and for other remaining neighbours. 

--- Features of Naughty Neighbor - scary house 2018 ---
- mysterious challenging Missions
- scary house environment
- easy and smooth real physic based controls
- variety of an interesting and challenging tasks
- compatible with the variety of devices
- hd graphics
- wicked neighbors
- amusing sounds

What are you waiting for? Just hit the install button for playing naughty neighbor - scary house on your device and enjoy the experience of hide and seek with your scary neighbour for teasing him.

title: OMG!! High School First Crush Date Zit Nightmare
description:
Everyone hates pimples on their face. Well Looks like Jassica is over confident about her beauty tips. Zit have took over her. So Gross!

Will you be able to get rid of the red, nasty zit on Jassica's forehead in time for date? Get out of the bed and start up body engine by brushing up teeth and cleaning up the face. Wear up the casual top and wait, Jassica have got zit?? Whattt?? Don't pinch. Now there is another one. OMG!

And not just any zit – a disgusting, HUGE zit! Jassica have to get rid of it before Chris found out. Time to take care for it ASAP! Doctor seems nice and wrote some cream herbal treatment to get rid of the zit. But that was temporary. OH NO!!!

No time to wait more, already getting late from high school, better to cover up and be stranger to Chris. Seemed like Jassica's BFF have finally got Jassica to the ultimate rescue. Laser treatment.

Phew! Now finally after getting rid of zit, meet Chris and set the time. Dress way up for the fun date with adorable face makeup and outfits. Both Chris and Jassica are looking even more cuter.

title: DIGI-S1 | Digimon Digivice (FandomPowered)
description:
When I was a kid growing up in the 90's Digivices and Tamagotchi's were all the rage. Taking care of a Digital Pet was unheard of. A lot of people had the Tamagotchis. A smaller portion had Digivices, making Digivices pretty rare. Purchasing a Digivice now is troublesome. So I created this app to solve that problem. The app is not the typical Digimon Digivice.  Transferring to Android created some changes. 

Feed and Battle your Digimon to keep them happy and level them up to Digivolve. Keep up to 4 Digimon at a time.

title: Mu Origin No Mercy -Miracle  MMORPG- Newest Game
description:
Mu Origin NoMercy is the most fair and romantic action MMORPG online! 
Enjoy unlimited battle & Trade free in grand open world with stunning visuals and graphics!

In This fantastic Adventure game you can choose among 5 Races to become the most powerful warrior of the Continent.
- Warrior uses physical strength and carry amazing weapons.
- Archer uses her speed to master the long range Bow.
- Magician can cast powerful spells to put their enemies into their knees.
- Magic Gladiator that combines both strength and wizardry.
- Summoner that can cast amazing spells to destroy any enemy.

[Introduction] 
Mu Origin NoMercy is a fair and romantic 3D MMORPG mobile game features on many unique game play and systems.
You can play this game communicating with multiple players online.
Is a 3D online action role-playing game that rated as a promising mobile MMORPG, which brings high quality graphics with a variety of challenging quests. 
To be distinguished from the crowded realistic style action RPG games, Mu No Mercy brings a fresh open world.
Creative marriage and wedding system grants you the real social experience. 
MU rose as the first 3D fantasy MMORPG.

[Game Features]

▶ Real & Romantic Social Experience ◀  & [Stunning 3D Gameplay Visuals]
- Sweet wedding. Easy to meet someone you love in the game. Play together and grow together, get a romantic wedding ceremony. Special wedding fashion and powerful wedding rings. Exclusive couple dungeon!
- Cross-server PVP and all-server chatting makes the game more thrilling and exciting.
- Share items among guildmates. In Mu No Mercy, you can share items with friends in guild and help each other. Make your guild stronger.
- Explore the massive vast 3D world with your friends!

▶ Free Trade System ◀ 
- Earn profits everyday! In the trade market, you can sell all the items you don’t need or extra equipments you obtained from killing bosses or other quests. None of your items or time shall be wasted.
- Freedom of choice! A lot of precious items in the trade market for you to pick.
- Cooperate with each other and defeat fierce monsters!

▶ Abundant Gameplay & Fierce PVP ◀  [Intense Real-time PvP War Battles]
- PvP is allowed on all maps. Unlimited PK in the grand open map and enjoy the excitement in massive PVP. Defeat red-name player will have a chance to get ultimate equpment. Seize your chance!
- Cross-server PK system will allow you to chase for the Top position with players from different servers. Just show your power!
- High drop rate of BOSS. Grab rich resources from fierce BOSS while you should take care of assaults from other players. If you are strong or lucky enough to give the last blow, then the ultimate equipment is yours. Watch out!
- Battle other players in thrilling real-time, open-field PvP battles or wage war on an epic scale through competitive 50-vs-50 Legion Siege matches!

▶ Customized Looks: Cool Mounts & Wings ◀  [Numerous Outfits & Mounts]
- Flying mount, really cool and useful. Dozens of cool mounts including Phoenix, Hell Hounds and so on. Accompany you to travel across the grand open world. Make your pet combination to be even mightier
- Abundant wings will make you stand out of the ordinary. Will you be the angel and save the world ?

▶ Rich Welfare & Resources ◀ [Level Up Offline]
- “Fair play” proceeds fast growing and level up with plenty of resources needed for growth by doing daily quests, killing bosses and unlimited PK & events.
- With the high rate investment plan, you can gain diamonds for free easily!

Official Website: https://mobi.munomercy.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MuNoMercy/


Mu Miracle Origin is a free to play (MMORPG), however, you can also buy some in-game items with real money. 
Under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Mu Miracle Origin 


SUPPORT
For questions or support we are here to help! 
Please visit us at https://www.facebook.com/MuNoMercy

description:
Temple Ultimate Legends Ninja Run 2018 is a survival for the superstar legends hero who is afraid of the monster, so run for your safety in this old temple environment. The game starts as turtle survival in the jungle temple dodging the ghost. This ultimate turtle comes for the help of sword fighting in the jungle escape temple 2018 game. Real ninja Run is a fast and risky game in which you will have to survive and escape from the temple with the stolen gold! By joining this ninja temple adventure, avoid obstacles and pitfalls, enjoy the fast and crazy game experience, and, as a hero, get the ultimate treasure! Scary and dangerous environment and mysterious undersea scenes, enigmatic jungles and stately castles, Swordfighter! This time you will face the challenge of ice and fire in this amazing challenging temple game. Just enter in the dangerous era run faster, jump, spin, run, and win in this adventure game. Collect the bulk amount of gold coins and ready for the sudden attack by monsters and then get ready too for the immediate escape from this jungle battle.

In this Temple Ultimate Legends Ninja Run 2018 you are not a superstar fighter but you have stolen a cursed idol from the temple, and you are in a critical situation and have to escape from here by the fear of the devil monsters and monkeys on your heels at these amazing impossible tracks. Examine your running skills and sharpness as you race down ancient temple walls and along sheer cliffs. You have the superpowers to move forward as faster as you can with turning and spinning techniques and skills.

Do you know that this is a running the turtle simulator, where you can win this stunt by fast running and winning the streak over impossible devil? Rush fast to the finish line in crazy stunt Temple Ultimate Legends Ninja Run 2018. You will have to face the devil monster in this amazing ninja running and simulation game of the year 2018. Running on the impossible jungle tracks is a very difficult task, impossible magic city track, impossible snowy mountain tracks, impossible wild animal track and all the impossible evils of the universe. Go and escape from the monster monkeys in this ninja run simulator game.

Features: 
-Amazing and beautiful jungle environment
-3D Graphics
-Multiple obstacles and barriers
-Easy to play, hard to complete
-More powers of devil and ninja
-Addictive and endless gameplay

title: 黎明奇迹
description:
[三大强职，选择属于你自己的荣耀]
狂战士、元素师、魔剑士，你所选择的是王城的未来！三大强力职业，四阶高级转职，你的力量超乎你的想象！

[得力骑宠，你并不是一个人在战斗]
迅猛飞龙，妖娆魔女，魔幻大陆的神奇生物将陪伴你战斗至最后一刻！无论飞翔还是疾走，强力的坐骑和宠物永远紧紧跟随。

[狂野异兽，面对内心深处的恐惧]
魔蛇、毒虫、变异的人马、崩坏的巫灵，纯净的世界之灵正被邪恶力量侵蚀：勇士，是时候击退你心中的恐惧了。

[海量在线，是敌是友由你决定]
公会、情缘、盟友、宿敌，海量在线玩家与你一同守卫王城，为内心的正义而战，谱写有血有肉的恩怨情仇。

summary: [命运源起，黎明奇迹!] 2018最受期待的魔幻MMO手游凌厉来袭！精彩绚烂的声画体验，酣畅淋漓的激烈决斗，丰富有趣的社区互动，给你一次恢弘壮美的魔幻冒险！

title: 暗黑戰域
description:
簡介
正統西方魔幻，原汁原味暗黑風！遊戲採用Unity 3D引擎打造，4K級3D畫面，史詩級劇情，高清遠景超大地圖，全方位打造沉浸式MMORPG手遊體驗。搶神兵，收坐騎，開啟最强王者之路；打BOSS，爆神裝，可自由交易，平民也能制霸全服；公會戰，陣營戰，無鎖定自由戰鬥，暢享PK快感；人性化設計，一鍵資源追回，1秒升至世界平均等級；多種玩法、福利全面開放，這是一款你從未玩過的暗黑手遊。

=====遊戲特色=====

◆正統西方魔幻原汁原味暗黑風◆
國內知名團隊歷史2年匠心研製，4K級3D畫面，史詩級劇情，高清遠景超大地圖，全方位打造沉浸式MMORPG手遊體驗。

◆最强減負一鍵升至世界平均等級◆
超爽資源追回，1秒昇到世界平均等級，再也不怕沒時間玩，跟不上節奏！

◆打BOSS爆神裝可自由交易◆
講實力，看運氣，拼人品，超高難度BOSS首次開放，爆出神裝可自由交易。

◆不爽就幹實时PK一戰成名◆
公會戰，陣營戰，野外PK，追殺紅名，這是一個弱肉强食的世界！十年刷怪無人問，一戰成名天下知！

◆搶神兵收坐騎開啟最燃王者之路◆
手持絕世神兵，脚踏上古坐騎，九階神裝身上穿，試問天下誰敢不服？

※聯繫我們※
如果您喜歡我們的遊戲，歡迎您關注我們，隨時給我們留言、評價。
粉絲團：https://www.facebook.com/anheizhanyu/

title: Lien Quan Giang Ho (Offline)
description:
Liên Quân Giang Hồ là trò chơi nhập vai kiếm hiệp quen thuộc. Lấy bối cảnh thời phong kiến kiếm hiệp đem lại cho người chơi cảm giác quen thuộc qua từng nhiệm vụ. Trò chơi đem lại những hồi ức về thế giới võ lâm ngày xưa với các đại môn phái trên giang hồ như: Thiếu Lâm, Đường Môn, Võ Đang, Nga My, Cái Bang...
Ưu điểm của Liên Quân Giang Hồ:
-Hệ thống đồ hoàng kim
-Trò chơi có hệ thống bản đồ đa dạng gồm các thành thị, thôn trấn và các bản đồ luyện công từ dễ đến khó.
-Hệ thông điểm tiềm năng và kỹ năng để bạn tự do thoải mái nâng cấp nhân vật theo sở thích.
-Hệ thống vật phẩm đồ xanh với ngũ hành tương sinh, tương khắc để kích hoạt thuộc tính ẩn.
-Hệ thống nhiệm vụ môn phái để học kỹ năng
-Hệ thống săn boss hoàng kim
-Hệ thống đảo tẩy tủy
-Hệ thống võ học đặc trưng của môn phái:
  + Thiếu lâm phản đòn
  + Đường môn chí mạng cao
  + Võ đang dùng nội lực hóa giải sát thương
  + Nga my kỹ năng hỗ trợ đa dạng, hồi máu
  + Cái bang lực tấn công cao
Trò chơi với nhiều tính năng quen thuộc sẽ giúp bạn bôn tẩu trong thế giới võ lâm quen thuộc ngày nào. Hãy cùng khám phá để có giây phút giải trí nhé.

Fanpage hỗ trợ: https://www.facebook.com/tenmbgame

title: Survival Evolved : kiziland ark -FREE Idle Game
description:
The description of Survival Evolved : kiziland ark- Idle Game

Survival Evolved : kiziland ark is an idle clicker game ! Click and drag two same Kizis and help them evolve into a unique and powerful creature. Gain stars and collect coins to boost your progress and use amazing special power-ups to unlock super Kizi!

★ One of the best idle clicker games in the store! ★

Update: We added a beautiful new world with 3 challenging levels and 88 stunning characters! 


★FEATURES:
✔ Click eggs to earn stars and start your adventure!
✔ Swipe any Kizi onto a similar one to evolve them to a new better creature!
✔ The more you progress in the evolution process, the more gold coins you gain!
✔ Use your stars and coins to upgrade your creature to a new Kizi!
✔ The more you click, the bigger the bonus becomes!
✔ Unwrap Kizi’s surprising gifts to boost your evolution progress!

title: 尋仙：相揪來抓妖
description:
【遊戲特色】
- 還原端遊 再續仙緣 -
將尋仙端遊內容還原到手遊，經典大世界探索、團隊副本、騎寵戰鬥等多項玩法，在世界地圖上盡情探索、拾荒、接取任務，還能呼朋引伴攻略野外BOSS！

- 七大仙職 遨遊三界 - 
新職業「奇門」降臨！控火法師、掌電法師、幽冥符咒師、天君符咒師、御劍遊俠、金剛力士等多樣職業，另有獨創的仙階系統，通過渡劫才可以從凡人晉升成神仙！

- 多元副本 幫會爭霸 -
經典神話副本、眾人齊戰世界BOSS、師徒攜手共探葬花林、激情燃燒爭霸仙府、門派征戰大世界等經典玩法，帶給你一段嶄新的仙途冒險！

- 捉寵系統 耐心培育 -
野外有著超過百種寵物等著被捕獲，如台灣經典妖怪「虎爺」、「魔神仔」、「玉山小飛俠」，甚至還有反差萌的「紅衣小女孩」，待你制伏收編入伍！

- 騎寵作戰 馳騁仙界 -
重現端遊騎寵作戰系統，擁有一隻專屬於你的仙寵，不僅讓修仙的道路有寵相伴，培養騎寵技能也能為你增加戰力，讓你在戰鬥時如虎添翼！

- 共乘坐騎 成雙成對 -
獨特的多人共乘設定，每一隻騎寵皆有不同乘載人數以及移動速度，甚至還有共乘翱翔的飛行座騎，與你的夥伴遨遊仙境，快意江湖！

- 騰雲駕霧 逍遙仙境 -
360 度全方位自由控制飛行的方向及高度，無論是在城內還是野外，除了大量減少跑圖的時間，還能將3D絕美場景盡收眼底，暢遊四海！

※《尋仙：相揪來抓妖》依中華民國遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為 : 輔12級。
※ 本遊戲部分內容涉及打鬥、攻擊等未達血腥之畫面或有輕微恐怖之畫面。
※ 本遊戲部分內容涉及使用者虛擬戀愛或結婚。
※ 本遊戲為免費使用，遊戲內另提供購買虛擬遊戲幣、物品等付費服務。
※ 請注意遊戲時間，避免沉迷。

更多第一手消息請見《尋仙》官方粉絲團：
https://www.facebook.com/9453play.xx/

- 騰雲駕霧 逍遙仙境 -
360 度全方位自由控制飛行的方向及高度，無論是在城內還是野外，除了大量減少跑圖的時間，還能將3D絕美場景盡收眼底，暢遊四海！

title: Vampires Love Craft - Dating with Monster
description:
You are welcomed by the developer One Craft History!

Enjoy the blocky world of Vampires Love Craft - Dating with Monster.

Vampires Love Craft - Dating with Monster - this is a historical game where you have to think hard about quests and puzzles, fight with the bright side, protecting your love. The world of this game is dark and full of dangers, and the main vampire hero is awaited by werewolves and monsters, zombies and priests, meetings with which will have to be avoided. The only way to survive is to move around the floor and ceiling, turn into a bat and do not slow down.

Features:
- Exciting and easy game
- Unknown night world
- Find your soul mate
- Many different blocks and objects 

Both girls and boys will be happy to play this game. A game in which you will not be bored, you will constantly carry out missions, seek a new solution, build a house for your family of vampires in Vampires Love Craft - Dating with Monster.

title: Mafia - The Party Game
description:
Mafia is a game of deception, fun and thrills and a lot of plot twists.

First you need to create an account in app, and then create a game, or join one. Remember that you actually need some friends to play this game, it's not single player. So, call your friends and play together.

In lobby the host is able to modify the roles that will randomly be given to players ingame. Mafia knows each other, and they are OP, so they shouldn't exceed 20% percent of the players. The town doesn't know each other, but they are more, and they have voting power.

After the game starts, you will be assigned a random role, and after you see it you need to hide it. Nobody else can see your role. 
How works the game? Well, each night, you can do your character action: doctor - heals, sheriff - checks, escort - blocks, mafioso - kills, witch - changes the target of a player, and I will add many more (you can write ideas in comments). The day, you will see the results. If someone was attacked, but healed, nothing will happen, which is good for town, but in most cases, someone will die. Then, the town decides who to kill, by selecting a player and voting him up. Your vote counts, and be sure to kill the right guy. Here comes the interesting part. During the day, you can discuss with the other players verbally about clues, about roles, about who to vote. You can even claim your role, but you are not allowed do show it. You can claim any role you wish, but as town it's better to tell the truth. After the voting phase, or if half the players voted to skip the day, the night begins again and this continues until a faction wins.

There is also a shop, where you can buy favors. A favor will guarantee the role you wish in your next game, if it is an available role and no one else has a favor of that role.

title: Infinite Dungeon Breach: Pet Raising Idle RPG
description:
Put down those hardcore games for a dungeon adventure with your favorite hero!
No clicking, touching, or tapping required here!
A story of heroes that never ends, featuring 24-hour online or offline play.

An action game set in a mysterious fantasy world
where progress is made whether you're watching or not, and you move forward whether you're playing or not!
Infinite Dungeon Breach: A hands-off pet raising RPG

Join four unique heroes and more than 100 types of pets on a journey all your own!
Find rare relics that grant special abilities!

Create the perfect combination of hero, pets, and relics to form the ultimate party!

4,000 stages! Constant battles!
Resurrection is essential to progress in Infinite Dungeon Breach!

■ This app is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases. 

■ Please note that data will be deleted when deleting games. Deleted data can not be recovered.

■ Permissions
We request the following permissions to ensure uninterrupted gameplay.

[READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE]
It is used to store and retrieve game data to external storage such as SD card.

[GET_ACCOUNTS]
Game account and Google account information interlocked, require the appropriate permissions for notifications.

[READ_PHONE_STATE]
View device information for customer interaction and for in-game advertising services. (Manufacturer, model name, OS version, etc.)

■ Contact
Send your game-related inquiries to 'service@superawesome.co.kr' and we will reply as soon as possible.
----
Developer contact information:
12th floor, 513 Seolleung-ro, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, South Korea (06150)
070-4157-8088

title: 發條英雄
description:
【遊戲簡介】
浮城島——無盡黑暗中的一點光明之地。這是邪神阿雷瑞斯吞噬創世女神之後，英雄們為了保全最後一點火種，創造出來的庇護之地。現在，浮城島依舊彌漫著黑暗，但人們卻習慣了平靜的生活，勇士們負責對抗黑暗，居民們負責提供充足的物資保障，一切都那麼的井然有序。

直到有一天，一隊冒險者在進行例行城外探查的任務時消失了，遺留的線索指向了浮城島外的無盡黑暗，於是，他們的密友紛紛踏上拯救他們的征途……

【遊戲特色】

1 精美畫面，極緻體驗
卡通風格放置類ARPG豎版手遊，再造魔幻探險题材巅峰之作。精美真3D戰鬥畫面，完美呈現迷宮、地下城、沙漠、草原，帶來極致視覺體驗；創新動作風格，集合三大職業：勇猛戰士，奇幻法師，靈動刺客，總有一款適合您~

2 挂機養肝，輕鬆戰鬥
作為一款輕鬆的放置類手游，《發條英雄》拒絕無謂肝課，簡便操作，無需設置，離線自動繼續戰鬥，回到遊戲就可以一鍵收取全部收益。吃飯睡覺，打怪升級，一樣都不誤，輕輕鬆鬆簡簡單單，享受闖關的爽快感~
 
3 雙線冒險，多元玩法
兼備地上戰場的肆意搏殺和地下迷宮的解密探索，雙重主線，多種玩法。在地上戰場冒險打怪、升級、收裝備之餘，還能前往神秘的地下迷宮，開始史詩級冒險之旅，享受探險的刺激。有開不完的寶箱，殺不完的boss，超多驚喜等待著您~


4 萌寵降臨，可愛升級
極具特色寵物系統，無門檻獲得，海量收集，自由重生，隨心養成。在這裡，您不是一個人在戰鬥，還有超萌怪物與您同行，共同探索未知的勇者大陸，有他們，您將不再孤單，戰鬥也會更加輕鬆。與您一同競賽一同歡樂，這樣的“黏人的小妖精”您會喜歡嘛？


5 丰富社交，不再孤獨
公会，跨服，协助，立體化的社交玩法，體會征戰樂趣，勇士之路不再獨行。公會系統是玩家互動社交的大本營，公會成員可互相捐贈寵物，齊心協力走得更遠。也可以在公會副本中進行戰鬥，將遊戲的樂趣最大化。與公會小夥伴們共同成長，早日登頂公會戰場的巔峰！

與可愛怪物萌系激戰，成就勇士傳奇！魔性耐玩的放置類動作手遊《發條英雄》邀您一起來探險！上發條，去戰鬥！

——支援——
您有遊戲相關問題嗎？我們非常樂意為您解決遊戲中遇到的任何問題，請及時和我們聯繫唷！
Facebook官方粉絲專頁： https://www.facebook.com/FTYX.MFG/

Facebook Group：https://www.facebook.com/groups/FTYX.MFG/

Line：https://line.me/R/ti/g/xEQbhCw9vc

Email：cs.ftyx@gamemorefun.com

title: Decisions - Episode 2: Interactive Visual Story
description:
In this exciting new episode , play and learn with Cecelia as she deals with her father loosing his job, interesting classmates and a lot of temptation from several different guys.

Play as  a teenage girl in a typical, African suburb and experience the challenges she faces.
Decisions - Cecelia Choices is an interactive story where the player experiences the story from the perspective/viewpoint of the lead character. 

Decisions - Cecelia Choices....
Make decisions about Cecelia’s love life and how she deals with pressures from her peers and her challenging financial situation. 

The resulting consequences of these decisions determine the course of the story.


-  Beautiful Art and Subtle Animation
-  Fully Voiced Dialogue
-  Your decisions matter and influence the story

title: Ground Forge
description:
In the 23. century mankind has spread throughout the galaxy to thousands of star systems. The greatest modern-day heroes are the star colonizers - the men and women at the forefront of this great expansion. All the grown-ups admire them and the children want to become them.

Yet from the population of 72 quadrillions, it is only a few thousand a year that can be sent further into the galaxy. For the selection process, the United Government decided to create the Ground Forge league. It is the greatest, most challenging and dangerous sport ever imagined.

Ground Forge is based on the heroic deeds of the star colonizer Sean Grylls on the planet of Kepler-442b. Following the disastrous failure and crash of his drop pod, he was left with nothing on an alien world. Despite this, he miraculously managed to survive by first recreating the most primitive technologies and work his way up the civilizational ladder. After being stranded and considered lost for years, he was able to rebuild a space-age level comms relay and reestablish contact. To become a star colonizer today, you first have to walk a mile in his mocassins and enter the Ground Forge.

A challenger in the Ground Forge league has to:
* Crash land onto the planet using a military grade drop pod with no equipment.
* Explore their immediate landing ground and the rest of the huge open world beyond.
* Gather raw resources and minerals
* Craft and forge equipment.
* Hone their skills in crafts and martial arts.
* Fight alien creatures.
* Advance through the ages of the human civilization. From sticks and stones to lasers and drones.
* And most importantly: survive!

title: Prison For Life - map for mcpe
description:
The Prison For Life map for MCPE refers to an adventure genre. Well-done design, interesting atmosphere and carefully planned plot will allow you to have fun for the evening, and maybe for a week;) This card can be downloaded for mcpe and play on the phone. You have to get out of prison with the help of improvised means.

Game features:
Prison escape map Prison for Life has a special gameplay and the standard mechanics of destruction and construction does not work there. Features:
- The stones are destroyed only by a stone pick;
- Painted clay is broken by a golden pick;
- You can install the lever on the emerald block ;
- You can put dynamite on a quartz block;
- The glass is destroyed only by a glass cutter.

You appear in the cell and you have to get out. For this, you need to find a window with a lever on the wall. Then you should continue to search for the pickax and other tools for a successful escape. During the game you have to find the keys. From the corridor you get to the dining room, where you need to find the lever to get to the dashboard and so on.

To solve problems it is required to use logical thinking and be able to solve non-standard problems. The adventure genre does not involve "screamers" and unexpected attacks. During the game you will also find clues. In one of the rooms there is a lever that allows you to teleport to the exit and win if you wish to finish map faster.

This is a card that is characterized by stable working. Unlike most cards, this card is free of crashes and defects. To win, you need to solve the puzzle. In one of the rooms you will be forced to wander in total darkness to find a way out. Premises are built competently and the same goes for puzzles. For example, to make dynamite you need to find specific objects following the instructions on the notes scattered in different rooms.

If you were looking for a good adventure map, Prison For Life is a worthy option for fans of a series of prison escapes.

descriptionHTML:
The Prison For Life map for MCPE refers to an adventure genre. Well-done design, interesting atmosphere and carefully planned plot will allow you to have fun for the evening, and maybe for a week;) This card can be downloaded for mcpe and play on the phone. You have to get out of prison with the help of improvised means.

Game features:
Prison escape map Prison for Life has a special gameplay and the standard mechanics of destruction and construction does not work there. Features:
- The stones are destroyed only by a stone pick;
- Painted clay is broken by a golden pick;
- You can install the lever on the emerald block ;
- You can put dynamite on a quartz block;
- The glass is destroyed only by a glass cutter.

You appear in the cell and you have to get out. For this, you need to find a window with a lever on the wall. Then you should continue to search for the pickax and other tools for a successful escape. During the game you have to find the keys. From the corridor you get to the dining room, where you need to find the lever to get to the dashboard and so on.

To solve problems it is required to use logical thinking and be able to solve non-standard problems. The adventure genre does not involve "screamers" and unexpected attacks. During the game you will also find clues. In one of the rooms there is a lever that allows you to teleport to the exit and win if you wish to finish map faster.

This is a card that is characterized by stable working. Unlike most cards, this card is free of crashes and defects. To win, you need to solve the puzzle. In one of the rooms you will be forced to wander in total darkness to find a way out. Premises are built competently and the same goes for puzzles. For example, to make dynamite you need to find specific objects following the instructions on the notes scattered in different rooms.

If you were looking for a good adventure map, Prison For Life is a worthy option for fans of a series of prison escapes.

Creator: AlexL1980

This map work well with MCPE 0.12.1, 0.13.1, 0.14.0, 0.14.1, 0.15.0, 0.15.1, 0.15.8, 0.16.0, 0.17.0 etc.
